N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.1002: The Golden Order is broken to its core.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.1003: They will fight. And they will die. In an unending curse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.1004: For how else is a champion, or a lord, to be born?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.1101: Of the return of the Tarnished. To the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.10000100: Shaper of life, arbiter of fate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.10000200: Lord of the very stars above.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.10000300: Tarnished warrior, spurned by the grace of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.10000400: Seek that which hath been lost to thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.10000500: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.11000000: Brave Tarnished. Mighty warriors, who fought at my side.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.11000100: Await the summons. It will call to thee one day.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.11000200: Heed the fading grace. Listen to the Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.11000600: Be ready, once it is shattered.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.11000700: Seek the Elden Ring, O Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.11000800: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12000000: Long ago, ye Tarnished lost something most dear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12000100: The Elden Ring. O Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12000200: Its gold commanded the very stars,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12000400: Though shattered, it yet guides thy kin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12000410: Though fractured, it yet guides thy kin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12000500: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12000900: And Sir Gideon Orphnier, the All-knowing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12001100: But their ambitions are yet unmet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12001200: Surely thou hast thine own design?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12001300: Then implore the Two Fingers, for guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12001400: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.12001510: To stand before the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.13000100: Its gold commanded the very stars,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.13000800: And Morgott, Prince of the Omen.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.13000900: Each, inheriting their own shard, played a part in the Shattering,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.13001000: a war with no end, and no victor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.13001100: And so the Two Fingers call upon ye, the Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.13001200: To cross the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.14000000: The fallen leaves tell a story.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.14000100: The great Elden Ring was shattered.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.14000200: In our home, across the fog, the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.14000300: Now, Queen Marika the Eternal is nowhere to be found,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.14000400: and in the Night of the Black Knives, Godwyn the Golden was first to perish.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.14000500: Soon, Marika's offspring, demigods all, claimed the shards of the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.14000600: The mad taint of their newfound strength triggered the Shattering.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.14000800: A war from which no lord arose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.14000900: A war leading to abandonment by the Greater Will.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.15000200: The call of long-lost grace speaks to us all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.15000300: Hoarah Loux, chieftain of the badlands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.15000700: And Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-knowing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16000100: But when I recall, I see it true.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16000200: On a night of wint'ry fog.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16000300: The Rune of Death was stolen,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16000400: And the demigods began to fall, starting with Godwyn the Golden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16000500: Queen Marika was driven to the brink.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16000700: triggering the Shattering, an internecine war between demigods.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16000800: The conqueror of the stars, General Radahn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16000900: And the Blade of Miquella, Malenia the Severed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16001000: These two were the mightiest to remain, and locked horns in combat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16001100: But there would be no victor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16001200: And so, we inhabit a fractured world.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16001300: Awaiting the arrival of the Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16001400: Unless of course, thou shouldst take the crown?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16500100: But when I recall, I see it true.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16500200: On a night of wint'ry fog.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16500300: Bearers of Black Knives stole into the dark.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16500400: And the demigods began to fall, starting with Godwyn the Golden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16500500: Queen Marika was driven to the brink.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16500600: The Shattering ensued; a war that wrought only darkness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16500700: The Elden Ring was broken, but by whom? And why?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16500800: What could the Demigods ever hope to win by warring?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16500900: The conqueror of the stars, General Radahn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16501000: And the Blade of Miquella, Malenia the Severed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16501100: These two were the mightiest to remain, and locked horns in combat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16501200: But why was there no victor?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16501300: And so, we inhabit a fractured world.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16501400: Awaiting the arrival of the Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.16501500: Unless of course, thou shouldst take the crown?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20010000: You think this is the one, Torrent?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20010100: Don't worry, it's not too late.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20010200: He is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20010201: She is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20015000: Don't worry Torrent, fortune is on his side.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20015001: Don't worry Torrent, fortune is on her side.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20015100: We found him here, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20015101: We found her here, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20015200: One of his kind is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20015201: One of her kind is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20015300: ...Even if it does violate the Golden Order...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20030100: In search of the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20030200: Emboldened by the flame of ambition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20030500: Let it be Margit the Fell!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20040000: Mighty dragon, thou'rt a trueborn heir.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20040100: Lend me thy strength, o kindred.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20040600: I am the lord of all that is golden!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20070000: It's been a long while, Morgott.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20070100: Long and hard didst thou fight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20070210: Spurned by the grace of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20070600: To be granted audience once more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20080200: Thou didst me good service, Serosh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20080700: Now I fight as Hoarah Loux!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20140100: You must abide alone a while.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20140200: No one else will take you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20145300: To the birthplace of our dynasty!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20210200: What is thy business with these thrones?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20210500: The twin prodigies, Miquella and Malenia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20211000: Thy kind are all of a piece.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20211100: Pillagers, come seeking vengeance upon the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20211110: Pillagers. Emboldened by the flame of ambition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20211300: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20211400: Felled by King Morgott! Last of all kings.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20240100: Ahh, art thou come to be born anew?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20240200: Be not afraid, there is no pain...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20245200: I'll soon birth thee anew, a sweeting fresh and pure...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20250100: Have no fear, I will hold thee. Patience...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20250200: Ye will be countless born, forever and ever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20250210: Ye will be countless, born, forever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20250400:
Upon my name as Ranni the
Witch, thou wilt not go
unpunished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20250500:
After death, quite the tale will be
thine to tell.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20250600:
Of the last Queen of Caria,
Rennala of the Full Moon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20250700:
And the majesty of the night
she conjureth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20255100: Have no fear, I will hold thee. Patience...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20255200: Ye will be countless born, forever and ever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20255300: Upon my name as Ranni the Witch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20255410:
Mother's rich slumber shall not be
disturbed by thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20255700:
Of the last Queen of Caria,
Rennala of the Full Moon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20255800:
And the majesty of the night
she conjureth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20260100: My flesh was dull gold...and my blood, rotted.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20260200: Corpse after corpse, left in my wake...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20260500:
I am Malenia.
Blade of Miquella.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20260600: And I have never known defeat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20265100: Did you not heed my warning?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20265300: You would steal the last drop of warmth from his empty frame?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20265310: After all you've taken, you still want more?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20265400: Then you will have to kill me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20265500: I am Malenia, Sword of Miquella.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20265600: And I have never known defeat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20270000: My dear twin, accept this gift.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20270100: A gift of abundance, my last drop of dew.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20275100: The scarlet bloom flowers once more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20300300: A fitting sacrifice you shall be, for the Serpent King.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20300310: Join the Serpent King, as family...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20300400: And devour the gods with me!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20300410: Together, we will devour the very gods!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20391000: General Radahn is cursed ever to wander.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20391010: Before we begin, allow me to paint you the full picture.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20391100: Eaten from the inside, by Malenia's scarlet rot, his wits are long gone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20391200: Now he gathers the corpses of former friends and foes alike, gorging on them, like a dog.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20430100: Burn, for the sake of the new Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20430200: Thank you. For guiding me here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20430300: The one who walks alongside flame,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20430400: Shall one day meet the road of Destined Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20430600: I hope you will become Lord. Lord of each and all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20480000: Now wilt ye serve, each and all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20480100:
The new Elden Lord,
steward of a fracturing world.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20480110: And so beginneth the age of fracture...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20481000: The fallen leaves tell a story.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20481100: Of how a Tarnished, of no renown, became Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20482000: The fallen leaves tell a story.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20482100: Of how a Tarnished became Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20482200: In our home, across the fog, the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20483000: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20484000: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20485000: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20486000: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20486100: The reviled curse that defined our age.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20490200: To every living being, and every living soul.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20490300: Now cometh the age of the stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20490400:
A thousand year voyage
under the wisdom of the Moon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20490500: Here beginneth the chill night that encompasses all, reaching the great beyond.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20490700: As the path stretcheth into darkness...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20495200: To all the hearts that remain in thy thrall.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20495210: To all life, and the souls harboured therein.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20495300: Now comes the age of the mind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20495400:
A thousand year voyage,
governed by the wisdom of the Moon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20495500:
All shall be encompassed, in a still and silent night, unending.
And thought shall turn to fear,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20495700: And a path stretching into the darkness...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20500110: I will seek you, as far as you may travel...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20500200: To deliver you what is yours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20540100: Return to the bosom of earth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20540400: So shall I give of myself. This is for thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20540500: Mine abundance, my drop of dew.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20540600: Quench thy thirst, throughout thy frame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20540700: Blossom and burgeon, time and again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20541000: When thou canst share in my dream.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20541200: Beget Order most elegant, from my tender reverie.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20560100: Impress my vision upon thine heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20560200: In the new world of thy making,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20640000: And one other. Whom grace would again bless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20640200: Cross the fog, to the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20640300: to stand before the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20700000: The Rune of Death is unbound.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20700100: Black flames have devoured the Erdtree,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20700110: and the Lands Between are shrouded by Death's dark fate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20700200: But the flames will also burn the impenetrable thorns.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20730000: Well, if you really are that gullible...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20730100: then stay away from the Volcano Manor!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20750100: Lord host, I could not be more content.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20750200: I found knowledge, and then found someone. That someone was you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20750300: And now, inside you, here I am...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20770100: I should have known, you scheming little thief.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20780100: My sincerest gratitude. I thought I'd never wrench that thing open.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20780200: You're the finest customer a man ever had!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20830100: This is how you die, you disgusting Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20830200: Don't worry, I've got big plans for you. After you snuff it...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.20860300: Unleash it upon them! A cursed blessing to all!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100010000: Have you heard of the Finger Maidens?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100010010: They serve the Two Fingers, offering guidance, and aid, to the Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100010020: But you, I am afraid, are maidenless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100010030: I can play the role of maiden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100010050: To aid you in your search for the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100010060: You need only take me with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100010070: To the foot of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100011010: Summon me by grace to turn runes into strength.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100011030: I bequeath to you this ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100011040: Use it to traverse great distances.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100011050: It will summon a spectral steed named Torrent.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100012000: I understand. I'm asking you to put faith in but a stranger.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100012010: Yet I'm certain that we can reach an understanding.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100012020: Summon me by grace if you should reconsider.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100020000: Shall I turn your runes to strength?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100020010: Let my hand rest upon you, for but a moment.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100030000: This tiny golden aura is the grace of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100030010: This light once shone in the eyes of your Tarnished brethren.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100030020: But now it is all that guides you. Or so I hear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100030030: You can see them, can't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100030040: The rays of grace, that guide you through your burden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100031020: For my purpose, given to me by my mother inside the Erdtree, long ago.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100031030: For the reason that I yet live, burned and bodiless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100031040: There is something for which I must apologise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100031050: I've acted the Finger Maiden, yet can offer no guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100031060: I am no maiden. My purpose…was long ago lost.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100032000: Upon the cliff, in Castle Stormveil, is a shardbearer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100032010: A demigod who inherited a fragment of the shattered Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100032020: If the rays of grace signal the castle,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100032030: then the Elden Ring beckons you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100032060: To face the challenge presented by the Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100040010: Words of Queen Marika, who vanished long ago.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100040020: If you wish, I will share them with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100041000: Very well. In Marika's own words.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100041010: My Lord, and thy warriors. I divest each of thee of thy grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100041020: With thine eyes dimmed, ye will be driven from the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100041030: Ye will wage war in a land afar, where ye will live, and die.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100041040: Well? Perhaps that might serve you in lieu of a maiden's guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100042000: Of course. Perhaps there is no need.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100042010: Tell me if you should change your mind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100043000: Spoken echoes of Queen Marika linger here, as well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100043010: Shall I share them with you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100044010: Then, after thy death, I will give back what I once claimed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100044020: Return to the Lands Between, wage war, and brandish the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100044030: Grow strong in the face of death. Warriors of my lord. Lord Godfrey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100045010: The Erdtree governs all. The choice is thine.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100045020: Become one with the Order. Or divest thyself of it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100045030: To wallow at the fringes; a powerless upstart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100101010: Hear me, Demigods. My children beloved.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100101020: Make of thyselves that which ye desire. Be it a Lord. Be it a God.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100101030: But should ye fail to become aught at all, ye will be forsaken.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100102010: O Radagon, leal hound of the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100102020: Thou'rt yet to become me. Thou'rt yet to become a god.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100102030: Let us be shattered, both. Mine other self.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100103010: I declare mine intent, to search the depths of the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100103020: Through understanding of the proper way, our faith, our grace, is increased.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100103030: Those blissful early days of blind belief are long past.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100103040: My comrades; why must ye falter?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100104010: Hark, brave warriors. Hark, my lord Godfrey. We commend your deeds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100104020: Guidance hath delivered ye through each ordeal, to the place ye stand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100104030: Put the Giants to the sword, and confine the flame atop the mount.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100104040: Let a new epoch begin. An epoch glistening with life.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100104050: Brandish the Elden Ring, for the Age of the Erdtree!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100105010: To see whether or not grace truly does guide you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100105020: And...whether you are fit to face the challenge that entails.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100105030: It seems my worries were unfounded.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100105040: Torrent had your measure from the very start.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100105060: There is but one other thing I can do to offer you guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100105070: I can take you to the Roundtable Hold...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100105080: Gathering place of Tarnished champions, guided by Grace...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100106010: Let my hand rest upon you, for but a moment.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100107010: To determine if the Elden Ring would truly have you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100107020: If you had the mettle to endure this long and arduous path.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100107030: It seems my worries were unfounded.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100107040: Torrent had your measure from the very start.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100107060: There is but one other thing I can do to offer you guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100107070: I can take you to the Roundtable Hold...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100107080: Gathering place of Tarnished champions, guided by Grace...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100110010: He is always eager to see your return.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100110020: Please, will you talk to him, when you can?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100110030: I'm sure he would be much contented.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100111010: I see him crying, from time to time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100111020: I think he misses his mother.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100111030: He wants someone to tell him he's beautiful.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100111040: Does being born of a mother...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100111050: Mean one behaves in such a manner?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100120010: Is there...another person inside of you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100120030: I sense no malice. Do as you think best.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100120050: I am Melina, and I have an accord with this person.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100120060: We might be together for some time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100121010: Is there...another person inside of you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100121030: I sense no malice. Do as you think best.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100121050: I am Melina, and I am travelling with this person.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100121060: We might be together for some time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100130010: Only a little further till the foot of the Erdtree, and the accord is fulfilled.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100130030: I was born at the foot of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100130040: Where mother gave me my purpose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100130050: Though now, everything is lost to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100130070: The reason for which I live, burned and bodiless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100131010: For bringing me to the base of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100131020: Here, I can govern my own movement.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100131030: And thus, the accord is fulfilled.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100131040: I shall depart to ascertain the purpose I was given.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100131060: I shall leave Torrent, and the power to turn runes into strength, here with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100131070: I wish you luck, in realising your ambition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100131080: You have fought long and hard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100131090: I have no doubt you will become Elden Lord. May you take the throne.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140010: It's me, Melina. Your travelling companion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140020: Allow me a moment to converse with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140030: You were unable to enter the Erdtree, no?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140040: Prevented by the mantle of barbs.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140060: A husk of the Erdtree's being; that spurns all that exists without.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140070: The only way to stand before the Elden Ring...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140080: and become the Elden Lord...is to pass the thorns.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140090: My purpose serves to aid in that very act.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140100: So I'd like you to undertake a new journey, with me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140110: To the flame of ruin, far above the clouds, upon the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140120: Then I can set the Erdtree aflame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100140130: And guide you. Down the path to becoming Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100141000: I wish to journey with you once more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100141010: To the flame of ruin, far above the clouds, upon the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100141020: Then I can set the Erdtree aflame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100141030: And guide you. Down the path to becoming Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100150020: All I ask of you is to make the journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100150030: To the snowy mountaintops of the giants, far above the clouds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100150050: I'm asking you to commit a cardinal sin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100150060: But it must be done to reach the path beyond.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100150070: And that is the path I wish to travel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100160000: There is something I'd like to say.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100160010: My purpose was given to me by my mother.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100160020: But now, I act of my own volition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100160030: I have set my heart upon the world that I would have.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100160050: I won't allow anyone to speak ill of that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100170010: The flame of ruin lies just ahead.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100170020: I'm glad it was you I travelled with.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100170030: I must tender my thanks to Torrent, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100170050: Please continue to lend your aid. Till the end.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100171000: I have long observed the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100171010: This world is in dire need of repair...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100172010: Let my hand rest upon you, for but a moment.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100173010: Tell me, when you are fully prepared.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100174000: Are you ready to commit a cardinal sin?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100180000: If you intend to claim the frenzied flame,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100180020: It is not to be meddled with.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100180030: It is chaos, devouring life and thought unending.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100180040: However ruined this world has become, however mired in torment and despair...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100180060: There is beauty in that, is there not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100180070: If you would become Lord, do not deny this notion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100180080: Please, leave the frenzied flame alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100181000: I shall see to the kindling.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100181010: It is a purpose which I choose to fulfil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100181020: So, please... Leave the frenzied flame alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100182000: The frenzied flame is not to be meddled with.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100182010: It is chaos, devouring life and thought unending.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100182020: So, please... Leave the frenzied flame alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100185000: I ask you, one more time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100185010: Please, seek not the frenzied flame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100185020: As one who strives to become a Lord,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100185030: deny not the lives, the new births of this world.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100185040: Those who would are not fit to be called Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100185050: When the land they preside over is lifeless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100186000: Please, put a stop to this madness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100186010: The Lord of Frenzied Flame is no lord at all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100186020: When the land they preside over is lifeless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100190010: A pity. You are no longer fit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100190040: Should you rise, as the Lord of Chaos,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100190050: I will kill you, as sure as night follows day.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100190060: Such is my duty, for allowing you the strength of runes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100191010: A pity. You are no longer fit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100191040: Should you rise as the Lord of Chaos,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100191050: I will kill you, as sure as night follows day.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.100191060: Such is my duty, for allowing you the strength of runes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101001000: You, please, I can read them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101002020: Within the fog, a gaping hole. Beyond the fog, one cursed by blood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101002030: Below the surface, traces of those who lurk in the shadows.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101002040: In the east, the east. Should you desire…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101003050: You will face wrath, then madness, and finally, chaos.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101003070: This is a path you must forsake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101003080: Dread awaits you in the south. Blackest dread!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101010040: At an abandoned church on that wee isle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101010050: You would devour the heart of an ancient?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101050020: Head to the foundation of gold, Tarnished...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101050040: …and reunite the half crescents, at the Grand Lift.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101050050: Oh, but the bridge is collapsed, and cannot be crossed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101060040: Slaughter, slaughter, slaughter... The all-hearing slaughtered, but alas, it was for naught.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101060050: But all you need do, is snatch it from the big pot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101070030: …Are you one for festivals? Or flowers?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101070040: To the South, a grand festival to make the stars turn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101070050: To the East, the hardened bud of a flower to be.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101070070: Into the heart of the scarlet rot?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101080000: What a pity it is, to be without the right.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101080010: All you can do is stand, at a loss.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101080020: Without even the half crescents that wish to be whole.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101080030: Before the unmoving, unfeeling Grand Lift ahead.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101080050: Or, are you planning to throw yourself to the waters?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101080060: To find the coward's passage, through the dim cavern?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101080070: What a pity it is, to be without the right.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101081030: You. The one who holds both half crescents.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101081040: Take the path to the Grand Lift ahead.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101081050: For you...are the one who will be Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101081070: Bear witness, one and all! The Lord is returned!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101081080: The Elden Lord is come again!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101090030: To the east...ruins of gold. To the west...the serpent's sacrilege.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101090040: Wherever the path leads, so shall you follow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101090050: Wherever the path leads, only more sorrow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101090060: Tis a curse! A curse! The curse of Queen Marika!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101100000: The Fingers I served once prophesied...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101100010: A Tarnished would one day become Elden Lord and restore the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101100040: The gold that enshrouds the heavens. The great tree which begets the pillars of light.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101100050: O Tarnished, hasten to the foot of the tree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101100080: The Fingers will surely guide you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101110010: Ahead lies the Land of the Giants' Flame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101110020: And the way forth is forbidden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101110040: Hear me. The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101110050: Doing so will unbind Destined Death, and slay the world itself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101110070: Who would dare put you up to such a task?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101120030: My poor, sweet lordling should have died a true death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101120040: As the first of the demigods to die.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101120050: As a martyr to Destined Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101120060: But why must it yet bring such disgrace?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101120070: A scion of the golden bough, sentenced to live in Death...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101120080: How could such a thing come to be...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101121020: My poor, sweet lordling should have died a true death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101121030: A scion of the golden bough, sentenced to live in Death...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101121040: How could such a thing come to be...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101801000: A curse! A curse upon you!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101801010: Your path leads only to death!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.101802010: You'll soil your hands soon enough.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001010: You've done well. I am Enia, the Finger Reader.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001020: I interpret the words of the Fingers, envoys to the Greater Will.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001030: Look there. The Fingers tremble. To welcome you, shardbearer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001040: Let their wisdom wash over you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001050: "Great Elden Ring, root of the Golden Order."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001060: "Anchor of all lands, giver of grace, wellspring of all joy."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001080: "The tragic corruption of the Order has taken its toll."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001090: "Across the realm, life lies in ruin. Fallen to pieces."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001110: "But the Greater Will has not abandoned the realm, nor the life that inhabits it."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001120: "So it is that the Tarnished are guided by grace. Called to act."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001130: "Brave Tarnished, your Great Rune is a handsome shard of the Elden Ring."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001150: "To become Elden Lord, and restore the Golden Order."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102001170: Let the words of the Fingers guide you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102002000: Ahh, Great Runes are the stuff of demigods;
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102002010: the children of the goddess, Queen Marika. She who is vessel of the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102002020: Tainted by the strength of their runes, her children warred, but none could become Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102002030: And so grace was extended, to your kind, the Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102002050: "The Greater Will has long renounced the demigods."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102002060: "Tarnished, show no mercy. Have their heads. Take all they have left."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102002090: The demigods are each and all the direct offspring of Queen Marika.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102002100: Godrick the Grafted was but a distant relation...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102002110: The runt of the litter, his divine blood sorely diluted.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102003010: A remembrance of gold has found its way into your possession.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102003020: Demigods, and even the greater of the champions,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102003030: are hewn by the Erdtree upon their end, into remembrances.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102003050: These remembrances yet house the power of their former masters.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102003060: And should you wish to wield that same power, well…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102003070: I will lend you the strength of the Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102003080: Heh… Do not recoil from my offer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102003090: The Fingers guide us all. And you Tarnished, you are here to take, are you not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102004000: Ah. You have returned. What is it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102005010: Let the words of the Fingers guide you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102010000: I had my doubts, but...my, look at you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102010010: Only once before have I seen two Great Runes together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102010020: Look there. The Fingers shudder with exuberance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102010030: "Fine work, brave Tarnished. The Greater Will is pleased."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102010040: "You have earned the right to become Elden Lord."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102010050: "Now, seek the Erdtree, and an audience with Queen Marika."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102010060: "To become Elden Lord, and restore the Golden Order."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102010080: As much from you as they do young Gideon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102010090: Take this. A token of farewell.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102012000: Queen Marika is the vessel of the Elden Ring, carrier of its vision.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102012020: But after the Elden Ring's shattering, she was imprisoned in the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102012030: A grim punishment for shattering the Order, despite her godhood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102012060: "But even in shackles, she remains a god, and the vision's vessel."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102012070: "Confer Great Runes to become Elden Lord, and join Queen Marika as her consort."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102020010: You know what this means. The Erdtree has spurned you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102020030: Shaken by this turn of events, they are busy consulting the Greater Will.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102020040: When they are finished, the Fingers will again offer their guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102020050: But thousands, if not tens of thousands, of moons must first pass.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102020060: No matter for me. But you? How will you ever manage the wait...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102021000: It may be thousands upon thousands of moons before the fingers again offer their guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102021010: My, oh, my. Whatever will you do…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030010: That is not the domain of mere men.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030020: The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin. And you say you seek the power of the Rune of Death, too?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030030: The Rune of Death goes by two names; the other is Destined Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030040: The forbidden shadow, plucked from the Golden Order upon its creation…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030050: Unleashing the rune now would be unthinkable...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030060: The Fingers would never permit it. Nor would the Greater Will.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030100: The Fingers, dormant, severing our link to the Greater Will.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030110: The realm, and all life, in ruins. Impossible events transpire, beyond the ken of the Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030120: Who is to say that the cardinal sin must be cardinal forever?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102030140: Take the course you deem most worthy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102031010: Only the smoldering flame in the Great Forge of the Giants, on the highest peak in the Lands Between, can burn the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102031020: But special kindling is required to reignite the flame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102031030: For the flame to burn the Erdtree, a sacrifice is needed. Of one who envisions the flame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102031040: And can lead you to the Rune of Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102040010: What use do you have for me, now?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102040020: I am a Finger Reader. I will remain here, until their dialogue ends, and the Fingers speak again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102040030: Do as you please. Take whatever course seems most worthy to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102041010: You'd force this tired old crone to work, even now?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102041020: A harder taskmaster have I never met.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102042010: I'll see it to the end with you, if it please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102043010: Do what you believe is right.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102100000: Oh, such a fine gift, I will gladly accept.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102100020: I have no secrets for you to plunder.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.102100030: I lost my appetite for them a lifetime ago, or more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106001000: A pleasure to meet thee, Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106001020: I'd heard tell of a Tarnished hurtling about atop a spectral steed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106001030: And upon looking into the matter,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106001040: the talk, I surmise, is of thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106001050: Thou'rt possessed of the power, no?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106001060: To call forth the spectral steed named Torrent.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106002010: I was entrusted this, for thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106002030: Tis a bell for calling forth spirits.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106002040: Summon them with it, from ash unreturned to the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106002050: The spirits will obey thine command but briefly, as they recall battles past.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106002060: Now it is thine. To do with as thou wishest.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106003010: I doubt we shall again meet. But all the same, learn well the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106003020: How long will it be, I wonder...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106003030: Before the Tarnished tire of obeisance to the Two Fingers?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106010020: The name of the spectral steed thou callest?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106011010: Thou'rt possessed of the power, no?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106011020: To call forth the spectral steed named Torrent.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106012000: Quite the stubborn one, aren't we?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106012010: Wise, in a way. The Lands Between are home to liars and cheats aplenty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106012020: Perhaps thine ample mistrust will be to thy benefit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106012030: I shall leave this for thee, at the behest of Torrent's former master.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106012040: Take it, shouldst thou overcome thy suspicion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106020020: No sense in arguing, I see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106020040: Torrent hath quite the ruffian chosen...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106030000: Let us speak of the past, a while.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106030020: Of the demigods, only I, Miquella, and Malenia could claim that title.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106030030: Each of us was chosen by our own Two Fingers, as a candidate to succeed Queen Marika, to become the new god of the coming age.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106030040: But I would not acquiesce to the Two Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106030050: I stole the Rune of Death, slew mine own Empyrean flesh, casting it away.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106030060: I would not be controlled by that thing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106030070: The Two Fingers and I have been cursing each other ever since...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106030080: And the Baleful Shadows...are their assassins.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106101010: I believe I said my name was Renna, when last we met.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106101020: It pleaseth me to see Torrent hale and hearty...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106101030: But Tarnished, what business hast thou here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106101040: I have no memory of inking thee an invitation.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106102010: Thou must have some business in mind, to come all this way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106102020: Though I have no memory of inking thee an invitation.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106110000: I see. Quite the sleuth, aren't we.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106110010: Indeed, I am the witch Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106110020: I stole a fragment of the Rune of Death, and used it to forge the godslaying black knives through fearsome rite.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106110040: But sadly for thee, the cursemark thou seekest is not to be found here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106110050: I have slain the body I was born into, and cast it away.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106110060: And it is upon that flesh the cursemark is carved.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106111010: And why should I reveal that to thee?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106111020: I performed the act not to bury the past, nor in shame of the deed,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106111030: but all the same, thy begging compels me not a jot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106111040: The cursemark thou seekest is not here. That is all I will say.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106112000: The cursemark thou seekest is not here. That is all I will say.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106113010: Thou wouldst render me aid, is that thy proposal?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106113020: Affording thyself opportunity to grope about for the cursemark's location, no doubt?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106113050: There's nothing wrong with a well-laid scheme.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106113060: What's more, if my past and past wounds beckon to thee,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106113070: I am curious enough to see what thy destiny portends...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106113080: I'll allow it. Enter my service.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106120010: No reason in particular, thou claimest?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106120020: Intriguing. Then mayhaps fate hath steered thee to this reunion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106120030: Intriguing. Then mayhaps fate hath steered thee to this encounter.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106120050: Wilt thou enter into my service?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106120060: I am the witch Ranni. I stole Death long ago, and search now for the dark path.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106120070: That I might one day upend the whole of it, and rid the world of all that came before.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106120080: Well? Has that roused thy interest?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106121000: I see. A choice well made.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106121010: Thou'rt a rare sort. Not many would have accepted the offer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106121020: But I require as much of those under my command.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106121030: I anticipate good work from thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106122010: Come to me again, shouldst thou change thy heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106122020: Surrendering thyself into the service of a doll-witch...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106122030: Is not as frightful as thou fearest...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106123000: Ah, art thou persuaded to my cause?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106123010: Then, again I shall ask, wilt thou enter into my service?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106130000: Good, then I ask we proceed with haste.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106130010: There is, in my service, a half-wolven warrior by the name of Blaidd.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106130020: I would have thee join him in searching for the hidden treasure of Nokron, the Eternal City.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106130030: I have called for Blaidd to greet thee below. Take from him the particulars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106130040: Ah, and there wilt thou find Iji, my war counselor, and Seluvis, preceptor in the sorcerous arts, also.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106130050: Heed not their peculiarities; feel secure in gaining from them what advantage thou canst.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106130060: I am sure the others will be doing just the same.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106131000: Speak with the three who await thee below.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106131010: Thou needst not indulge them unduly, but they too wish to appraise thy worth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106131020: It hath been a passing long time since a newcomer entered my service, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106135000: Good, then I ask we proceed with haste.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106135010: Art thou aware of the star that struck Limgrave?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106135020: It left a vast crater, and through it lieth the Eternal City of Nokron.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106135030: Go there to find the city's hidden treasure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106136000: Ah, yes. Iji, my war counselor, and Seluvis, preceptor in the sorcerous arts, can be found below.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106136010: Like thee, they are in my service.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106136020: Heed not their peculiarities; feel secure in gaining from them what advantage thou canst.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106136030: I am sure the others will be doing just the same.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106137000: Speak with the three who await thee below.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106137010: Thou needst not indulge them unduly, but they too wish to appraise thy worth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106137020: It hath been a passing long time since a newcomer entered my service, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106140000: Ah, allow me to forewarn thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106140010: I shall soon enter my slumber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106140020: And it will be some time before I wake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106140030: This doll's body is not without its hindrances...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106140040: Still, I have high hopes for thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106140050: I look forward to the good news when I arise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106141000: I shall soon enter my slumber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106141010: And it will be some time before I wake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106141020: I have high hopes for thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106141030: I look forward to the good news when I arise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106170020: Even in my slumber, I sensed it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106170030: It is in thy possession, is it not? The hidden treasure of Nokron?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106170040: My thanks. Finally, all the pieces are in place.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106170050: Soon must I begin my journey. Upon the dark path only I may tread.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106171000: Ah, but before I leave, I must entrust thee with this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106171020: My discarded flesh lieth beyond the seal unlocked by it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106171030: Upon which is carved the cursemark of thy desire.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106171040: I can fathom what thy purpose might be.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106171050: Neither of us is welcomed by the brighter path, I see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106171070: It was but brief, but thou gavest me fine service.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106172010: Thy purpose in approaching me was to obtain the cursemark, was it not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106172030: I, too, am to depart on a journey. Upon the dark path only I may tread.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106175000: Ah, but before I leave, I shall entrust thee with this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106175010: My thanks, for thy sterling efforts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106175020: A strange gift, perhaps, but a rare sort such as thee would welcome it, I am sure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106175030: I am certain now, fate steered us to our reunion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106175040: I am certain now, fate steered us to our first encounter.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106175050: I must thank Torrent too, for his part.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106175070: It was but brief, but thou gavest me fine service.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106176000: What is it? You may go.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106176010: I, too, am to depart on a journey. Upon the dark path only I may tread.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106192010: Oh? A dogged fellow, aren't we?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106192020: Or is it merely thy habit, to talk to dolls?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106192040: I hadn't expected any soul to recognise me in this guise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106192050: But now the cat is out the bag, I cannot allow thee thy freedoms.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106192060: Perform for me a service, as recompense.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106192070: Eliminate the Baleful Shadows which prowl these lands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106192080: The name of Ranni the Witch is already sullied by thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106192090: I will not brook disobedience in this matter.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106193000: Perform for me a service, as recompense.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106193010: Eliminate the Baleful Shadows which prowl these lands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106193020: The name of Ranni the Witch is already sullied by thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106193030: I will not brook disobedience in this matter.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106200000: Let us speak of the past, a while.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106200020: Of the demigods, only I, Miquella, and Malenia could claim that title.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106200030: Each of us was chosen by our own Two Fingers, as a candidate to succeed Queen Marika, to become the new god of the coming age.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106200040: Which is when I received Blaidd. In the form of a vassal tailored for an Empyrean.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106200050: But I would not acquiesce to the Two Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106200060: I stole the Rune of Death, slew mine own Empyrean flesh, casting it away.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106200070: I would not be controlled by that thing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106200080: The Two Fingers and I have been cursing each other ever since...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106200090: And the Baleful Shadows...are their assassins.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106201000: I turned my back on the Two Fingers and we have each been cursing the other since.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106210000: Even when I turned my back upon the Two Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106210030: Though he was created a vassal for an Empyrean,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106210040: He was a colossal failure, on the part of the Two Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106210050: Blaidd, and Iji both... Art willing to give too much to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106210060: Yet they both understand. What lieth beyond the dark path...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106210070: That I must betray everything, and rid the world of what came before.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106210080: Ah, should I add thee to the list?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106210090: Another one, kind of heart. As kind of heart as they.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106211000: Ach, this form hath loosened my tongue.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106220020: That Ranni the Witch cometh, to rend thy flesh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106220030: With a fateful wound, ne'er to heal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106230010: My thanks. 'Twas more of a challenge than I envisioned.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106230020: Now I can finally stand before them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106240000: So, it was thee, who would become my Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106240010: Perhaps I needn't have warned thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106240020: I am pleased, however. Thou'rt a fitting choice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106240030: I go now, to the night sky. It is there I shall find mine order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106240040: I bid thee travel the path of the Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106240050: And once all is done, we shall see each other, once more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106250010: I take it thou'st noticed? I shouldn't be surprised.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106250020: I thought I might expound a little further...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106250040: Mine will be an order not of gold, but the stars and moon of the chill night.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106250050: I would keep them far from the earth beneath our feet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106250060: As it is now, life, and souls, and order are bound tightly together, but I would have them at a great remove.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106250070: And have the certainties of sight, emotion, faith, and touch...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106250090: Which is why I would abandon this soil, with mine order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106250100: Wouldst thou come to me, even now, my one and only Lord?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106251000: Mine will be an order not of gold, but the stars and moon of the chill night.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106251010: And I would abandon this soil, with mine Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106251020: Wouldst thou come to me, even now, my one and only Lord?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106260000: Well, this is a most unpleasant awakening.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106260010: The depths of wickedness never fail to surprise me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106260020: I am saddened. That thou wouldst succumb to such depravity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106260030: Led astray by Seluvis, with devious tonic in hand,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106260040: Didst thou think to have thy way with me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106260060: I won't have another whiff of thy rotten breath.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106261000: I have spoken. Away from my sight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106262000: This is the third time, fiend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106300020: To think such was thy plot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106300030: Well, I refuse to indulge thy fantasies.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106300040: I relinquished a natural death long, long ago.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106301030: So, this is the measure of my Lord?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.106301040: Perhaps it is precisely what I deserve.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200001000: Come, sweetings, become what ye desire.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200001900: Come, sweetings, time to be born, anew.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200002910: I'll soon birth thee anew, a sweeting fresh and pure...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200006000: Thy fate lieth under my moon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200007000: Guide thy moon as thou wishest.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200007900: Oh little Ranni, my dear daughter.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200009000: Where did ye flee, my sweetings?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200009010: Come out, from whence ye hide. There are books and light aplenty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200009020: Dither not; come out say I!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200009030: Or will ye be gravestones? To be better born anew?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200010010: Is it thy wish to be born anew?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200010020: To become a sweeting, reborn of my beloved egg?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200011010: Is it thy wish to yet again be born anew?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200012000: Now, bear this sweeting into life anew.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200013010: I would birth thee as a sweeting, fair and fine.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200014010: Art thou now assured of thy want, to be born anew?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200015000: Ah, it seemeth thou'rt a sweeting rather fair.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200015010: And if thou wert born anew once more, thou wouldst be fairer still.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200015020: Ye will be countless born, forever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200016000: Ah, thou'rt now a sweeting full fine and fair.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200016010: My thanks. For being born of my beloved egg, time and time again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200030000: Where did ye flee, my sweetings?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200030010: Come out, from whence ye hide. Of the dark, be not afeard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.200030020: My beloved egg is with us. Come out, I prithee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002000: Who's that? Who could it be?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002100: A new friend. A new playmate for us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002150: Just watch, he'll be born again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002151: Just watch, she'll be born again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002200: Then Mother will hold him tight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002201: Then Mother will hold her tight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002250: He'll be so warm, warm and cosy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002251: She'll be so warm, warm and cosy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002300: That'd be nice, so very nice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201002350: If we're turned to stone, will we be born again?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201003050: Did he just die? And him, too?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201003100: Is he not a friend? I can't tell…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201003101: Is she not a friend? I can't tell…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201003200: Can we still be friends, if we try?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201003250: Yes, we can be friends, I'm sure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201003300: He'll understand, if we just explain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.201003301: She'll understand, if we just explain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202002050: I shall grant thee... eye...and claw.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202004020: Death... My sin... Should not be touched...by the hand of man...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202005000: I shall grant thee... eye...and claw.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202010020: Still, I am not sated... Not nearly sated...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202010040: Marika... Is this...what it is...to sin?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202010080: But I have done...all I can...in this land...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202010090: Henceforth, mine appetite shall be my sole companion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202011010: But I have done...all I can...in this land...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202011020: Henceforth, mine appetite shall be my sole companion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202053030: I must have more... I must consume more...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202060010: I will not have it stolen from me again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202061020: Tis no matter. I hereby vow,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202061030: that Destined Death shall not be stolen again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202800000: I shall not part with it again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202802000: Cower. Before Maliketh, the Black Blade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202803000: Cower. Before Maliketh, Marika's Black Blade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.202804000: Witless Tarnished... Why covet Destined Death?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.203900010: I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.203904030: One day, the scarlet bloom will flower again...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.203905040: I'm sorry. I finally met my match...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204001000: Well, thou art of passing skill.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204001010: Warrior blood must truly run in thy veins, Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204002000: As I thought, thou'rt of passing valour...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204002010: but the dark of night is yet to lift.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204002020: The hands of the Fell Omen shall brook thee no quarter.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204003010: Put these foolish ambitions to rest.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204003020: The Erdtree is firmly rooted, always.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204004010: The flame of ambition leadeth thee astray.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204004020: Come, hands of the Fell Omen. Snuff out this wretch's flame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204006010: Smould'ring with that wretched flame of ambition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204006030: For the hands of the Fell Omen will soon be upon thee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204006040: To put out thy little flame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204007120: Thy part in this shall not be forgiven.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204008000: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204008010: Felled by King Morgott! Last of all kings.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204009000: May the curse seep to thy very soul.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204009010: An apt reward for thy brash ambition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204010300: No one will be Elden Lord again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204800000: Well, thou art of passing skill.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204800010: Warrior blood must truly run in thy veins, Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204801010: Put these foolish ambitions to rest.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204801020: The Erdtree is firmly rooted, always.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204802020: Cower in fear. Of the night.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204802030: The hands of the Fell Omen shall brook thee no quarter.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204820030: Thy part in this shall not be forgiven.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204821000: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204821010: Felled by King Morgott! Elden Lord!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204822000: May the curse seep to thy very soul.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204824010: The Erdtree wards off all who deign approach.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204826000: None may claim the title of Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.204826010: Thy deeds shall be met with failure, just as I.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.206802000: A crown is warranted with strength!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.206803010: I will take thee in mine arms once more!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207001010: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207001020: There is only one tree, and only its branches.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207001030: That bathe in true rays of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207001060: O, we are the Golden Ones. The true and rightful heirs.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207001070: Our land's grown old, now ashen, and cold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207001080: But look up, the Erdtree glows!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207001100: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207001110: And grace will surely guide us safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207001120: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207002000: Hear me, my knights! Proud warriors and true.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207002020: Let the hunt begin! Fetch me a mighty branch to make mine own!
