N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322053010: But another exists. Another mark in the shape of the half-wheel wound of the centipede.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322053030: Before the time comes we receive our Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322054040: With this, Godwyn can take his rightful place as First of the Dead.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322054050: And claim a second, illustrious life.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322054060: You are my-- our true champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322054070: And though I can't be of any use to you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322054080: Can I hold you tight, if only for a moment?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323001000: Have you ever felt the curse, with your whole being?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323001010: The pox upon life itself, feared and despised by all. The reviled blessing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323001040: You are but a lamb. A stranger to defilement. Ignorant of your own ignorance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323001060: I've been long without peace. Don't spoil my quietude.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323002000: I asked you not to disturb me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323002010: Be thankful of the Hold's serenity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323002020: It is all that keeps your death and defilement at bay.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323010030: I can smell it on you. The pox, yet tender.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323010040: Apparently my seedbed is ripe and waiting.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323010050: Twas a brief respite, I must say.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323010060: Go, and unshackle my corporeal flesh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323010070: Trapped in the sewer gaol, below the capital.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323010080: I can kill you, and defile your corpse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323010090: Then the pox will truly be your own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323011000: Go, and unshackle my corporeal flesh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323011010: Trapped in the sewer gaol, below the capital.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323011020: I can kill you, and defile your corpse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323011030: Then the pox will truly be your own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323020010: Let me out! Let me out of here!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323022010: I will kill again. And defile each corpse with care.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323022020: Just to be sure. That when they're reborn…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323022030: They'll be cursed. Along with their children, and their children's children, for all time to come…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323023000: I will kill again. And defile each corpse with care.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323023010: Just to be sure. That when they're reborn…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323023020: They'll be cursed. Along with their children, and their children's children, for all time to come…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323024020: I must eat more. Defile more...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323025000: Let me out. Let me out of here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323030000: I will kill you, and defile your corpse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323030010: Then the pox will truly be your own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323031000: I'll give you a good blessing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323031010: You'll be nourishment for the pox.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323040020: Despite the curse stirring within you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323040030: No one has succeeded in that before.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323040040: How? I thought. Then it hit me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323040050: That you are, in fact, me. And I...am the Dung Eater.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323040060: It is my flesh that must receive the blessing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323041010: Defile my flesh with the seedbed curse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323041020: Again and again. Until it is done.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323041030: Until a cursed ring coalesces, that may one day defile Order itself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323041040: Countless, I have killed. And countless, I have defiled.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323041050: And soon the fruits will be borne.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323041060: Hundreds will be reborn cursed, and they'll bear thousands of cursed children, who'll bear tens of thousands more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323041070: A few of those will be born just like me, and they'll kill, and defile, and bless in my stead!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323041080: The rotten fools. My fate was the grandest, most brilliant of them all!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323042000: My corporeal flesh lies in the sewer gaol beneath the Capital.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323042010: Give it your blessing. Defile my flesh with the seedbed curse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323042020: Until a cursed ring coalesces, that may one day defile Order itself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323050010: A curse... A curse upon them all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323050020: They'll be born cursed, all of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323050030: Along with their children, and their children's children, heh, for all time to come…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323051020: One day, you'll get what's coming.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.323055010: No... I am... the Dung Eater...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324001000: Oh, this is a rare occasion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324001010: I can't remember the last time a new Tarnished made their way to the Roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324001020: Very well. As your senior, I bid you welcome.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324001030: It is safe here. You may let down your guard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324002000: Allow me a word of advice, as your senior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324002010: You are a mere visitor to the Roundtable, nothing more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324002020: A house guest, yet to earn their keep.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324003000: There's nothing left to say. Be at your leisure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324010000: What do you need? I have little time to spare.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324011000: Oh, are you aggrieved? At the notion you are but a visitant here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324011010: Then you would do well to remember the first words of grace given to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324011020: Stand before the Elden Ring, and become the Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324011030: If those words held any meaning to you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324011040: Follow the guidance of grace, lay low the shardbearers, and claim for yourself a Great Rune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324011050: Do so, and the doors to the Roundtable's inner chamber will open.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324011060: And you will receive the wisdom of the Two Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324012000: Once the wisdom of the Two Fingers becomes your own, I'll impart to you a proper welcome.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324012010: As a true member of the Roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324012020: I have high hopes for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324012030: I'm sick and tired of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324012040: These namby-pamby Tarnished think us no more than a shelter from the rain...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324013000: We've spoken long enough. I have matters to attend to.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324015000: If you haven't anything to say, I would prefer you didn't pester me for attention.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324015010: Try not to make a spectacle of yourself either. Or are you as irredeemably foolish as you appear?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324020000: You've received the wisdom of the Two Fingers, have you not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324020010: Then just as promised, I bid you welcome, as a true member of the Roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324020020: I am known as Gideon Ofnir.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324020030: As a Tarnished who wishes to stand before the Elden Ring and become Elden Lord,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324020040: I am accumulating knowledge. To be all-knowing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324020050: You now belong to a select group of fellows. As such, I ask that you remain constant.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021000: You'll be after more Great Runes, now eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021010: Then as your fellow, allow me to divulge a little knowledge.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021020: The inheritors of the Great Runes; the shardbearers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021030: We of the Roundtable know the location of five of them, including the one you defeated.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021040: Godrick the Grafted, Lord of Stormveil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021050: General Radahn, who fought Malenia and her rot to a standstill in the Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021060: Praetor Rykard, Lord of the Volcano Manor of Mt. Gelmir.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021070: Morgott the Grace-Given, Veiled Monarch and Lord of Leyndell.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021080: And Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon, ruler of Raya Lucaria's Academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324021090: ...You'll still be after more Great Runes, won't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324022000: So. Godrick the Grafted, Lord of Stormveil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324022010: Despite being the blood of Godfrey, first Elden Lord, he's a grotesque old fool, grasping for power.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324022020: His castle lies upon the cliff to Limgrave's northwest.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324022030: ...but I suspect you know that well enough already.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324023000: General Radahn, the famed Red Lion and scourge of the stars, is a ferocious warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324023010: He fought Malenia and her rot to a standstill in the Caelid Wilds to Limgrave's east.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324023020: And now Caelid has been engulfed by the scarlet rot, even approaching the region is no mean feat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324023030: I've heard survivors of Radahn's army are still in the wilds, staving off the rot with fire.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324023040: And if it's true, I suspect Radahn is still there as well, in Caelid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324023050: Though I doubt he much resembles his former self anymore...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324024000: Praetor Rykard is the Lord of the Volcano Manor on Mt. Gelmir.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324024010: He is a ruthless justiciar who commands a company of inquisitors, reviled for his serpentine demeanour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324024020: The volcano, Mt. Gelmir, lies in the west of the Altus Plateau; the realm of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324024030: It was the stage of the most appalling battle in the entirety of the Shattering.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324024040: Rykard has committed the grave sin of blasphemy. Marking himself as an enemy, never to be forgiven.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324025000: Morgott the Grace-Given is Lord of Leyndell, the capital city.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324025010: It lies at the foot of the Erdtree, in the east of the Altus Plateau.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324025020: But the Two Fingers forbid us from venturing there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324025030: Until we've acquired enough Great Runes to repair the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324025040: Set your sights elsewhere for the time being. The Veiled Monarch can wait.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324026000: The Academy of Raya Lucaria lies to Limgrave's north, towering over the mist-laden lands of Liurnia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324026010: Rennala is the queen of the Carian royals, who govern the academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324026020: But Rennala herself is no demigod.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324026030: She is merely the recipient of an amber egg, given to her by Radagon,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324026040: Her beloved, Radagon, left her to become Queen Marika's second husband, taking the title of King Consort.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324026050: The Great Rune dwells within the amber egg that was Radagon's gift to her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027000: There are four more demigods yet to be located.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027010: Miquella of the Haligtree, the Unalloyed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027020: His twin, Malenia, the undefeated swordswoman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027030: Lunar Princess Ranni, daughter to Rennala.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027040: And the one only known as the Lord of Blood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027050: Ranni is said to have cast aside her Great Rune,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027060: so here at the Hold, we seek the whereabouts of the remaining three shardbearers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027070: If you should learn anything of these matters,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027080: I'll trade your findings for a hidden treasure, or a long-lost rite, known only to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027090: We both desire to stand before the Elden Ring, and become Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027100: As such, I hope we are compelled to work together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324027580: I'll trade your findings for something rather special.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324032000: Well. I see you've found another Great Rune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324032010: Wonderful. You are a worthy fellow Tarnished, indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324032030: To the capital Leyndell, that lies to the east of the Altus Plateau, at the foot of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324032040: The Two Fingers will deny your passage no longer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324032050: You may be our best hope. Find your way to the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324032060: For we are Tarnished. And we must answer the call of grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324033000: Journey to the capital Leyndell, to the east of the Altus Plateau, at the foot of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324033010: The Two Fingers will deny your passage no longer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324033020: You may be our best hope. Find your way to the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324035000: General Radahn, the famed Red Lion and scourge of the stars, is a ferocious warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324035010: He fought Malenia and her rot to a standstill in the Caelid Wilds to Limgrave's east.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324035020: And by my reckoning Radahn remains there, even now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324035030: Though I doubt he much resembles his former self anymore...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324036000: Morgott the Grace-Given is Lord of Leyndell, the capital city.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324036010: It lies at the foot of the Erdtree, in the east of the Altus Plateau.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324036020: But the Two Fingers forbid us from venturing there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324036030: Until we've acquired enough Great Runes to repair the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324037000: The Academy of Raya Lucaria lies to Limgrave's north, towering over the mist-laden lands of Liurnia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324037010: Rennala is the queen of the Carian royals, who govern the academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324037020: And her Great Rune dwells within the egg she so dearly clutches.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324038000: You've received the wisdom of the Two Fingers, have you not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324038010: Then I bid you welcome, as a true member of the Roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324038020: I am known as Gideon Ofnir.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324038030: As a Tarnished who wishes to stand before the Elden Ring and become Elden Lord,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324038040: I am accumulating knowledge. To be all-knowing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324038050: You now belong to a select group of fellows. As such, I ask that you remain constant.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324040000: I understand you've been speaking to Nepheli.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324040020: I took her in when she lost the guidance of grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324040030: Though a mere axe-wielding barbarian, her youthful credulity suited my purposes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324040040: So I put her to work.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324040050: Do not hesitate to employ her, should her services benefit you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324040060: Despite her looks, she is more than capable in the press of battle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324041010: Indeed, it seemed the whelp harboured suspicions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324041020: So I had no further use for her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324041030: Honestly, what's a man to do.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324041040: A determined plebian is more wicked than an Omen horn, quite frankly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324041050: I suspect...that's just what the Queen wants.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324041060: A dose of ambition, to incite the Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324042000: Is that potion what I think it is?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324042010: Bloody Seluvis. I suppose he's up to something again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324042020: Oh, I won't interfere. You go ahead and do what you must.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324042030: The Roundtable has no code to speak of.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324042040: But, I ask you this. Are you really going to do the bidding of that twisted dolly botherer?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324042050: Or would you rather hand that potion to me, and see if we can't get one over on the bastard?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324043000: Good. I'll dispose of the potion myself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324043010: You go and see Seluvis, but don't give anything away.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324043020: Just tell him that you tricked your mark into drinking the potion as planned.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324043030: Despite knowing next to bloody nothing, he's so far up his own arse he won't suspect a thing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324043040: His inevitable display of arrogance will certainly be a sight to behold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324044010: But I think your plan would be a dreadful waste.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324044020: She's not herself right now, and though I have no need of her, she still has potential.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324044030: Certainly more value than she'd have as a bloody puppet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324045000: I hear you helped get the girl back on her feet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324045010: Though I'm not her foster father anymore, I'd still like to thank you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324045020: Sorry. For the time you had to waste.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324046010: If you want to do that dolly botherer's bidding, that's up to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324046020: Not that I could fathom why you'd want to...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324050000: Oh, my apologies for that nasty business.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324050010: Ensha got rather ahead of himself, it seems.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324050020: As his master, I'd like to express my regret.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324050030: But now, Ensha is slain and gone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324051000: Ah, yes, by way of apology,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324051010: allow me to tender some advice, in regard to the half of the secret medallion you possess.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324051030: She hides in a cave to the west of the Laskyar Ruins which jut from the mist-shrouded lake of Liurnia,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324051040: She knows the location of the medallion's counterpart, I am sure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324052010: She hides in a cave to the west of the Laskyar Ruins which jut from the mist-shrouded lake of Liurnia,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324052020: She knows the location of the medallion's counterpart, I am sure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324053000: Ah, yes, by way of apology,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324053010: allow me to tender some advice, in regard to the half of the secret medallion you possess.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324053020: Find the village of the Albinaurics.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324053030: It lies to the southwest of Liurnia, below the Altar clifflands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324053040: And some of the old village folk have hidden the secret medallion's other half somewhere.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324054000: Find the village of the Albinaurics.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324054010: It lies to the southwest of Liurnia, below the Altar clifflands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324054020: Some of the old village folk have hidden the secret medallion's other half somewhere.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324060000: Ahh, I know already. You're after it too, aren't you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324060010: To pass the impenetrable thorns, you seek the forge of the flame of ruin, in the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324060020: Then you need to reach the Grand Lift of Rold, beyond the forbidden region.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324060030: Hah, no need to pay me for that gift.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324060040: All my knowledge is for the sake of guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324060050: That a Tarnished might stand before the Elden Ring, and become Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324060060: It doesn't have to be me, my fellow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324061000: If you're heading to the forge of the flame of ruin, in the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324061010: You'll need to find the Grand Lift of Rold, beyond the forbidden region.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324061020: I marked your map with its location.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324061030: Go, if you would. Take no heed of "cardinal sin".
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324061040: The Two Fingers lost their purpose a long, long time ago.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324070000: Ahh, I see you've laid your hands on the other secret medallion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324070010: I'm glad to see my counsel has borne fruit, but the honour of the deed is yours alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324070020: You've made more of yourself than Ensha has...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324070030: Now, more importantly, both secret medallions are in your hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324070040: I suppose you'd like to know then? What awaits you on the path ahead?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324070050: Me too, my friend, me too. I wait with baited breath.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324071000: Ahh, so the secret medallions led you to the land of the Haligtree?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324071010: I'd expect to find Malenia there. She who fought Radahn to a standstill.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324071020: Well, if the scarlet rot hasn't eaten her away completely.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324071030: But...with the Haligtree as it is...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324071040: I suppose Miquella must already be...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324072000: Ah, my apologies. Lost myself, for a moment there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324072010: The information you've shared is of great value. As promised, your reward:
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324072020: A hidden treasure, known only to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324072030: A secret rite known only to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324072040: You are a true fellow. All I ask is that you remain constant.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324072530: And it is a wondrous thing indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324073000: So. The Haligtree, now but a husk...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324073010: I heard speculation Miquella embedded himself in the Haligtree,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324073020: but before he could finish, someone cut the tree open and absconded with his infant form.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324073030: Indeed, it seems those words held weight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324073040: How vexing. That the All-knowing didn't have the full story...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324073050: Perhaps the Queen's sorrow was justified...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324074000: Oh, so that's where the so-called Lord of Blood was hiding himself eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324074010: A fitting little squat for that deluded maniac to bleat about the revival of his precious dynasty, while he turns our fellow Tarnished into Bloody Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324074020: Let him stay there. That way, his delusions will remain as they are - distant and unattainable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324074030: But perhaps it's worth looking into...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324074040: If what I've heard is right, then maybe...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324075000: Ahh, I see! So Miquella was with the Lord of Blood after all!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324075010: That is some fine intelligence indeed!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324075020: With it, the final clue has been brought into the light.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324075030: One of the last few pieces the Roundtable-- I need, to put everything together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324075040: As promised, allow me to impart to you
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324075050: the last of the hidden treasures known only to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324075060: the last of the secret rites known only to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324075070: a thing most wondrous, known only to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324076000: Well, I wonder what comes next...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324076010: If he continues his slumber within the cocoon, all would be well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324076020: But perhaps it would be safer to destroy it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324076030: Miquella is the one thing that remains a mystery to me...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324077010: Then the Roundtable is soon to follow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324077020: Ah, no need to fret about that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324077030: The Roundtable Hold served to put a Tarnished upon the throne of Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324077040: And if the Erdtree needed to burn for that to happen,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324077050: then the Roundtable must go, as well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324078000: I'll stay at the Roundtable, for a time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324078010: I must learn all that can be taken from this place,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324078020: and sear it into my memory.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324078030: How could I call myself the All-Knowing, if I did any less?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324079000: The pursuit of knowledge is without end, for knowledge is never a thing complete.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324079010: Thus, I maintain the mantle of All-Knowing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324079020: Perhaps the same could be said of guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324079030: Who's to say whether we'll remain who we are, once the fight is finished?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324079040: What do you think, as one who aspires to become Elden Lord?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324080010: To stand before the Elden Ring. To become Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324080020: What a sad state of affairs.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324080030: I commend your spirit, but alas, none shall take the throne.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324080040: Queen Marika has high hopes for us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324080050: That we continue to struggle. Unto eternity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324100000: You think I don't know what that is?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324100010: I have no secrets for you to salaciously gawp at.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324100020: You think too little of Gideon Ofnir, the All-knowing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324800000: My fellow, you've fought well, until now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324801010: A Tarnished cannot become a Lord. Not even you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.324801020: A man cannot kill a god...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325001010: The pleasure's mine. Rogier's the name. A sorcerer, as you might have guessed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325001020: I'm looking for a little something, here in the castle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325001030: When I'm not hotfooting it from the troops, that is.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325001040: But enough about me, what are you doing here in Stormveil Castle?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325001050: This place is bristling with Tarnished hunters, you know. They sacrifice our kind, for grafting.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325001060: Not exactly a place I'd stroll into without a purpose in mind...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325002000: I see. Here to challenge Godrick, and lay your hands upon a Great Rune, are you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325002010: You can see it then, I take it? The guidance of grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325002020: Well, enjoy it while you can.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325002040: But unlike you, I've seen neither hide nor hair of this guidance for the longest time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325002050: Still, I won't forget how it felt when I first came here, to the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325002060: I'm privy to a few magical battle arts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325002070: Would you care to learn one?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325002080: As a fellow Tarnished, once guided by grace. I'd love to help you out, if it please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325003000: Oh? Keen to learn another battle art, are we?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325004000: Oh hello there, good to see you safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325004010: Stopping by to learn a battle art or two?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325005000: The battle art you've learned is of the glintstone family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325005010: They were conceived at the great Academy of Raya Lucaria, to the north of this castle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325005020: In the past, they obeyed laws which contravened the Golden Order, or so I'm told.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325005040: That the Golden Order was pliable enough to absorb practices that contradicted itself in the past.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325005050: With the Order broken, twisted, and in need of repair,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325005060: such adaptability is more important now than ever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325006010: Why place trust in a perfect stranger?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325006030: Watch you don't get sacrificed, eh. I'll do the same.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325007010: Or are you just trying to pass the time?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325007020: I'm curious how you ended up inside this castle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325020000: Ah, we meet again after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325020010: I apologise for any offence given by my bearing, but I'm quite unable to move, you see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325021000: Ah, you defeated Godrick and claimed yourself a Great Rune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325021010: Mm, looks like we both got we wanted out of Stormveil, didn't we.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325021030: Something to mark the occasion. Go on, take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325021040: As you might've guessed, I still can't move. My fighting days are behind me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325021050: No need to be polite, I've no use for it anymore.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325022010: That is a sacred relic. Of the black knives plot. As that famed night of assassination is known.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325022020: It happened during the Golden Age of the Erdtree, long before the shattering of the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325022030: Someone stole a fragment of the Rune of Death from Maliketh, the Black Blade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325022040: And on a bitter night, murdered Godwyn the Golden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325022050: That was the first recorded Death of a demigod in all history.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325022060: And it became the catalyst. Soon, the Elden Ring was smashed, and thus sprang forth the war known as the Shattering.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325022070: I once wished to become a scholar, you see. I've spent many an hour scouring the archives for knowledge of that fateful plot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325022080: The world has grown crooked, and if you intend to put it to rights,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325022090: You'd better understand what happened to make it this way, mm?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023010: I can scarcely believe you managed to get your hands on this!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023020: You recall our conversation about the Night of the Black Knives, yes?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023030: They say the assassins who carried out the deed were scions of the Eternal City.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023040: A group entirely of women, arrayed in armour of silver under cloaks which fooled the eye.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023050: The knives they wielded though, were imparted with the power of the Rune of Death through sinister rite.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023060: Please, I beg of you, lend me the knifeprint for a time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023070: I'd love nothing more than to tease out its secrets.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023080: Though only a fragment, a very specific ritual had to be performed to impart the power of the Rune of Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023090: Traces of the one who performed the rite are sure to remain in the imprint...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325023100: Half my body has been suffused with Death. I'm certain it will help me see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325026000: Always good to see you safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325027020: We found ourselves journeying together for a time, bound by our exploration of Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325027030: But our paths have since diverged. Never again to cross.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325027040: Though that's hardly an uncommon fate for two friends.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325028010: The name's Rogier. A sorcerer, by trade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325028020: But now I'm in this sorry state.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325028030: I had a little mishap, and now I can't move.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325028040: As you might guess, it's far from ideal...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325029010: I'm privy to a few magical battle arts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325029020: Would you care to learn one?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325029030: Time can move rather slowly, stuck here, you know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325029040: A little conversation goes a long way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030000: Ahh, hello. I was hoping to see you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030010: My examination is complete. Here's the knifeprint back, with my thanks.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030020: Now, I have a fairly good idea who performed the rite upon the blade. The person who orchestrated the Night of the Black Knives.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030030: Lunar Princess Ranni. One of the children born to King Consort Radagon and his first wife, Renalla.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030040: Demigod and sister to General Radahn and Praetor Rykard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030050: Her's was the name I discovered in the imprint.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030070: But, if I might be so bold, I would also like to ask something more of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030080: If Ranni truly is the one who plotted that fateful night,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030090: then she should bear the cursemark of Destined Death somewhere upon her flesh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030100: I would like you to procure it for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030110: And then all will be laid bare. I will have the answers I have sought for so long.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030120: Don't fret, it is entirely in accordance with the guidance of grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030130: If you seek to stand before the Elden Ring and become Elden Lord,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325030140: The answers you find will surely bolster your chances.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325031000: I have some idea of Ranni's potential whereabouts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325031010: There's a manor to the north of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325031020: It is the familial home of the Carian royals from whom Ranni descends.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325031030: There's been talk of the old royals' vassals gathering there in recent years
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325031040: Ranni's whereabouts since the Shattering are a well-kept secret. She hasn't been seen even once.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325031050: But I suspect she might have returned to the manor in which she was born...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325032000: If Lunar Princess Ranni truly is the one who plotted that fateful night,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325032010: then she should bear the cursemark of Destined Death somewhere upon her flesh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325032020: Would you be willing to procure it for me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325032030: She may have returned to the manor that is her home.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325032040: The Royal Carian residence to the north of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325033000: I'm afraid there's something I must tell you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325033010: Do you know of Those Who Live in Death?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325033020: The very notion of life in death defies the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325033030: By D's account, these defiled fiends must be expunged.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325033040: But truth be told, I seek the cursemark to save them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325033060: but I discovered something in my examination of the Night of the Black Knives.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325033070: These souls have committed no offence. They have every right to life, only, they happened to touch upon a flaw in the Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325034010: If D knew what drives me now,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325034020: he would surely boil over with rage.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325034030: Or perhaps, he would even feel some pity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325034040: But no need to fret, none of that will come to pass.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325034050: I can tell a good lie when I need to.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325035000: And...that thing is to blame for the shape I'm in now...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325035010: I urge the utmost caution. Don't disturb the corpse more than necessary...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325037000: Alright there. Good to see you safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040010: When Ranni shed her flesh, she shed the cursemark, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040020: You know, not everyone would trust such a tale...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040030: But, if she in her current form is nothing more than the living doll you profess...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040040: Then perhaps it's true after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040060: Forgive the bluntness of the notion, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040070: How would you like to become one of Ranni's vassals?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040080: Ah, only in order to get what we want, of course.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040090: The location of the body which bore the cursemark, which right now I haven't the faintest.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040100: And the best way to find out is for you to enter her service and take a poke around on the sly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040110: I know you've got what it takes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325040120: Not only are you a superb fighter, but people want to trust you. I've seen it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325041000: Can you become Ranni's vassal to advance our agenda?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325041010: While in her service, you'll be able to take a poke around on the sly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325041020: And determine the location of her original body that bears the cursemark.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325041030: I realise that I'm asking you to put yourself in grave danger.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325041040: But I know you've got what it takes. Quite possibly the only one, in fact.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325041050: Not only are you a superb fighter, but people want to trust you. I've seen it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325045010: That he discovered the mark of the centipede.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325045020: The centipede is an ancient symbol of the cursemark.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325045030: As long as whoever finds and uses it is not nefarious by nature,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325045040: then we may be able to form an alliance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325045050: If only I could speak to them in person.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325045060: And if they were like you, all the better.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325046000: Hmm. Maybe I should tell you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325046010: Lately, I feel I'm on the precipice...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325046020: Of falling into a deep...fathomless slumber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325046030: And I have an inkling it could spell trouble for you, somehow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325046040: So I just wanted to get the apology out of the way, beforehand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325046050: Since you're so scary and all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325050010: <struggles to say a word, but mostly fails>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325102030: Sorry. You were only trying to be nice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325102040: It would be my pleasure to take it. My thanks.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325800020: I am no foe of yours, far from it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325801010: I don't normally find myself cornered like a rat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325802000: No need to grandstand; you're not even on stage.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325810020: I am no foe of yours, far from it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325811000: If you think I am helpless,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325811010: you are quite mistaken, I'm afraid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.325812000: If this doesn't cause you shame, nothing will.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326001010: Name's Bernahl. Tarnished, just like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326001030: Are you here in the Lands Between to take up the fight?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326001040: Does your faith in the guidance of grace hold firm,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326001050: despite the collapse of the Golden Order?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326002000: Yes, you're a Tarnished through and through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326002010: Takes me back, but that's a quality needed now more than ever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326002020: Any interest in bearing the torch, of my battle arts?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326002030: All I know is the sword. Picked up a fair few tricks in my time, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326002040: Now's the time to pass 'em on. To a good and proper Tarnished, like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326003000: Oh, not had your fill, eh? Worry not, I've enough to keep you busy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326004000: Ah, hello. Glad to see you safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326004010: Here to learn a battle art or two?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326005000: There's a myriad of battle arts in these lands that I've yet to discover.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326005010: Mementos of all the warriors who raised their arms in battle, lost, and died.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326005020: A fine tale, all told, of true chivalric romance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326005030: That's how I fell in love with the sword, and the arts of combat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326005040: It grants meaning even to falling in battle, to death itself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326006000: Honest to a fault, I see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326006010: Such thoughts won't behove you, as a Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326006020: But there's nothing wrong with that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326006030: Any interest in bearing the torch, of my battle arts?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326006040: All I know is the sword. Picked up a fair few tricks in my time, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326006050: Now's the time to pass 'em on. To a good Tarnished, like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326007010: Well, there's no rush. Knowledge of the arts can wait another day.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326008000: There you are. Decided to bear the torch of my battle arts?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326010010: What in heaven's name are you doing here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326010020: The Volcano Manor is a pit of recusants who spit at grace and hunt our own kind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326010030: I hope you understand the weight of my words.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326011000: Well. As long as you understand what you're saying.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326011010: I thought you a Tarnished bred by virtue.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326011020: Perhaps playing that part led you to your doubts, I wonder.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326011030: But know that the path you walk is blasphemy, and leads only to a miserable death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326011040: Before you consider hunting any of your own kind, think on that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326012000: This blasphemous path leads only to a pitiful death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326012010: Before you consider hunting any of your own kind, think on that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326013000: So. You've bloodied your sword in the hunt.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326013010: Then I shall introduce myself once more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326013020: Bernahl, a recusant, just like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326013030: Recusants have particular battle arts, styled to our methods of slaughter.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326013040: Why not add some to your repertoire?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326014000: Oh, not had your fill, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326015010: Why not learn another battle art, see if we can't keep it that way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326016000: You've come to understand, now, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326016010: To take power and make it his own,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326016020: The recusant must hunt his own kind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326016030: To raise the flag of revolt against this sanctified pillaging,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326016040: We recusants must become the most wretched of predators.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326016050: All you can do is laugh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326017000: Look at you. A recusant through and through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326017010: I knew you had it in you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326017030: A special invitation, to hunt some of the first Tarnished who sat at the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326017040: If you should accept, I'll next see you on the field of battle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326018000: Ah, I had hoped you'd soon return.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326018010: I have the reward from Lady Tanith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326018020: Take it. It's yours, by right.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326018030: Let us tread the path of the recusant together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326018040: Till we reach the miserable death that awaits us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326020010: I harbour you no ill will. The strong take. Such is our code.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326020020: Even he was prepared to meet a wretched end when he first took blasphemy unto his very flesh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326020030: But anyroad, the Volcano Manor is no more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326020040: Though we may yet fulfil an old promise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326020050: We hunted our own kind, and took what was theirs.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326020060: And with everything in hand, the time has come to rise, against the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326021000: O Greater Will, hear my voice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326021010: I am the recusant Bernahl, inheritor of my brother's will, and you will fall to my blade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326021020: We refuse to become your pawns. Consider this fair warning.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326030010: And what in heaven's name are you doing here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326030020: The Volcano Manor is a pit of recusants who spit at grace and hunt our own kind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326030030: I hope you understand the weight of my words.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326040000: Well. As long as you understand what you're saying.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326040010: You have harboured doubts from the very beginning.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326040020: Perhaps this day was always lurking on the horizon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326040030: But know that the path you walk is blasphemy, and leads only to a miserable death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326040040: Before you consider hunting any of your own kind, think on that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326041010: Those with weak stomachs have no place here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326042000: I thought I told you to leave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326042010: Or do you claim to understand?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326042020: What it means to be a recusant, renouncing grace and hunting down one's own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326043000: Well. As long as you understand what you're saying.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326043010: But know that the path you walk is blasphemy, and leads only to a miserable death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326043020: Before you consider hunting any of your own kind, think on that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326100010: Thanking me for the battle arts?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326100020: You're one of the good ones. Thank you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326101020: For a recusant already drunk on blasphemy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326800020: I won't say it twice. Stop this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326801000: I suppose I have no choice, then.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326801010: Is this what grace would have of us?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326802000: Dog eat dog, once again. A sad lot, we Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.326803000: You are an enigma, to be certain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330001010: I welcome you, to the Church of Vows.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330001020: I am Miriel, steward of this sacred chamber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330001030: My apologies, for the unseemly state of affairs.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330001040: Do you know the origin of this place?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330001050: How it came to be known as the Church of Vows?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330002000: Well, that is a shame. But who can blame you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330002010: The Shattering has caused us - all of us - to lose sight of something very dear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330002020: It is here, at the Church of Vows, that the great houses of the Erdtree and the Moon were joined.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330002030: By the matrimonial bond between red-haired Radagon and Rennala of the Full Moon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330002040: And so, our church holds in view the monuments of both houses.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330002050: The Erdtree of the Capital, and the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330003000: Oh, was there something you needed?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330003010: You are free to show yourself around.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330003020: I would serve as your guide, only my legs aren't what they used to be...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330003030: If you find anything of use, you are free to take it with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330003040: Unless perhaps you are in search of instruction?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330003050: In which case, I will share all that I know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330003060: Whether it be sorcery or incantations, learning should not fetter you to one side or the other.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330003070: This is, after all, a church celebrating the union of two such opposed practitioners.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330011000: Do you possess any celestial dew?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330011010: Then I would like to share my knowledge with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330011020: Concerning the miracle of this Church of Vows.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330011030: Radagon once cleansed himself with celestial dew,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330011040: repented his territorial aggressions, and swore his love to Rennala.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330011050: The Order of the Erdtree and the fate of the moon were conjoined, and all the wounds of war forgiven.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330011060: This miracle blesses the church to this day.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330011070: And so, you need only follow Radagon's example,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330011080: to restore any bond, however strained or severed, to its rightful state of harmony.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330012010: The miracle rooted in these grounds will, once again, mend the world.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330012020: And this time, its bounty will not be squandered.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330012030: If you would be Elden Lord, Tarnished,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330012040: I hope that you, too, will share my faith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330014000: Are you taking the sword with you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330014010: Oh, fear not, I don't wish to chide you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330014020: Clearly, you are no conniving thief.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330014030: The sword is telling us something, no doubt.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330014040: Rather than collect dust in the shadows underground,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330014050: it yearns to be wielded by your rightful hand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330014070: As the priest of the Church of Vows, I undo the sword's seal, and bequeath it unto you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330014080: May you hold it high and proud.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330020010: Take this opportunity to learn to master your emotions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330020020: Worry not, I take no offence. But others are not always so forgiving.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330020030: Some take to anger, others sorrow... Bonds are fragile things, wont to break under strain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330020040: And once they're broken, everything is lost, with naught to gain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330021010: I suppose my ample frame must have given you quite the fright.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330021020: Allow me to introduce myself. Miriel, steward of this sacred chamber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330021030: My apologies, for the unseemly state of affairs.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330021040: Do you know the origin of this place?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330021050: How it came to be known as the Church of Vows?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330031000: To experience the miracle, kneel in the basin at the back, and cleanse yourself with celestial dew.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330031010: Absolution will be yours. Any bond, no matter how strained, or even severed, will be put to rights.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330033000: Ah, I see you have undergone absolution, the miracle that blossoms from these grounds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330033010: Good. As such, the bond you may have strained or severed...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330033020: Has been restored, to its rightful state of harmony.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330033030: Be mindful, not to take for granted...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330033040: the serenity restored by this miracle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330033050: And take care. Never to break a bond again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050000: You wish to know more of Lord Radagon?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050010: Lord Radagon was a great champion, possessed of flowing red locks.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050020: He came to these lands at the head of a great golden host, when he met Lady Rennala in battle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050030: He soon repented his territorial aggressions though, and became husband to the Carian Queen.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050040: However. When Godfrey, first Elden Lord, was hounded from the Lands Between,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050050: Radagon left Rennala to return to the Erdtree Capital, becoming Queen Marika's second husband and King Consort.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050060: Taking the title...of second Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050070: The mystery endures, to this day...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050080: As to why Lord Radagon would cast Lady Rennala aside...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330050090: And moreover...why a mere champion would be chosen for the seat of Elden Lord...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330051000: You know, it's said that Lord Radagon harboured a secret...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330051010: A famed sculptor of the Erdtree Capital was once summoned to render Lord Radagon's likeness in giant stature.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330051020: When he glimpsed the skeleton in Radagon's closet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330051030: And as such, it's said the great statue harbours his secret too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330052000: You wish to know more of Lady Rennala?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330052010: She is Queen, head of the Carian royal family, and governor of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330052020: The great and beautiful Full Moon Witch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330052030: Sadly, her heart was broken when Lord Radagon left her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330052040: And then, when the academy rebelled against the royals, she was locked away in the grand library.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330053000: In the end, Lady Rennala was left alone, cradling the amber egg Lord Radagon bequeathed her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330053010: Now she devotes herself to it through forbidden rite;
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330053030: You would do well to remember...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330053040: Severing a vow, strongest of bonds, has consequences ever more dire.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330060000: Why, this is nectar, is it not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330060010: And you're giving it to me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330060030: Truth be told, I'm rather fond of the stuff.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330060040: I'll happily take it off your hands!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330100010: Very well, let us both learn together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330100020: Heresy is not native to the world; it is but a contrivance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330801010: My flesh is akin to stone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330802000: I cannot be wounded. I cannot die.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.330802010: But nor will I cause any harm unto you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331001010: You trying to start something, mate?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331002000: Oh, that necklace what you're after, is it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331002020: Show me what it's worth to you,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331002030: and I'll consider parting ways with it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331002040: I'm not in love with it or nothing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331003010: First, you hand me the runes. And don't try nothin', neither.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331003040: Thing's no damn use to anyone, anyway.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331003050: Your bloody idea, mate. Don't come crying to me later.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331004000: Oh piss off, what is it now?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331004010: Oh, I see. You want some of me prawn?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331004030: Alright then. It's yours, if you can meet me price.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331004040: I could be persuaded to sell you some other bits too, if you've got the runes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331005000: What the hell is wrong with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331005020: Piss off. Before I crack you in 'alf.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331006010: Decided to play ball now, 'ave you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331006110: You'll be wantin' the necklace, then?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331007000: Think you're bloody clever, do ya?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331007010: Then how about you piss off?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331011000: Alright mate. Want some more prawn, do ya?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331012000: Never met someone with a taste for prawn I couldn't trust.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331012010: We'd make good mates, I reckon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331015000: Oh, so you met the girl, did ya?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331015010: Alright, well, sod the particulars of the matter,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331015020: But it ain't my fault she's stupid enough to get duped, is it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331015030: Anyway, she ain't all right, that one.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331015040: Lucky she ain't died on the bloody roadside, I reckon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331016010: Can you see it then? The guidance of grace, I mean.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331016020: I can't see it at all no more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331016030: Makes no bloody sense anyway, why some no-name shithead like me should get called to the Lands Between.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331016040: Cruel bloody joke, you ask me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331016050: Maybe something went tits up with it. Maybe... it's been broke for a good long time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331017000: You what? Sod the particulars, mate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331017010: Ain't my fault people are so bloody stupid, is it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331017020: Don't like that it's stolen? Don't sodding buy it..
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331020030: I got crab, cooked up fresh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331022000: Alright mate. Want some more crab, do ya?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331023000: Never met someone with a taste for crab I couldn't trust.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331023010: We've got a real thing here, eh, and it's only gettin' better.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331025000: Mate, there's somethin' I should probably tell ya.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331025020: E's a madman, 'as it out for everyone. Curses 'em. Goes 'round in this rank armour, an' all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331025030: You see 'im though, stay well away.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331025040: I was in the same gaol as him, once, so I know first 'and.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331025050: E's a god-forsaken monster. Not just some petty thug like me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331026000: E's a killer. Kills people and curses their souls...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331026010: Does all sorts of shit to their corpses, to keep 'em cursed, forever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331026020: I ain't seen nothin' more disgustin' in all my years.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331026030: I ain't ever been more scared, neither. Rooted to the bloody spot...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331026040: While 'e did all that, to my friend...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331027000: Yeah...and now I seen it 'ere, again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331027010: Never thought I would. What 'e does to those bodies.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331027020: It was... It was 'im, no question.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331030010: Fitting bloody end, for a jumped up little shit with big ideas...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331031000: Help me out, would ya, mate...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331031010: I don't wanna get cursed. Just let me die...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331031020: I don't wanna live like this...not anymore...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331801010: You don't mess with Big Boggart, mate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331802000: That bitch put you up to this, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331802010: Damn it! I'll rip you to shreds!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331803010: Damn it! I'll rip you to shreds!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331804010: That's the fists of Big Boggart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.331805010: Why ain't it me, why ain't it ever...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332002010: Here to put the demigods to the sword.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332002020: Then please. Kill the great serpent.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332002030: The one that devoured Praetor Rykard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332002040: I left the serpent-slaying spear in the Lord's Chamber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332002050: Worthy Tarnished, brandish the spear, and run him through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332003000: Praetor Rykard's ambitions, though blasphemous, marked him a worthy sovereign.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332003010: But they were reduced to gluttonous depravity, once he gave himself to the serpent.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332003020: Whatever that thing is, it is no longer Praetor Rykard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332003040: To spare him, and his ambitions, from further dishonour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332004000: Worthy Tarnished. I left the serpent-slaying spear in the Lord's Chamber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332004010: It is the only thing that can kill that horror.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.332004020: Run it through. The great serpent...that unspeakable monstrosity...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333001010: Then, perhaps you could spare some runes?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333001020: Believe it or not, I studied glintstone sorceries at the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333001030: For a small donation, I'd be happy to share my knowledge.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333002030: Presuming you're interested, I can teach you sorceries, as promised.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333002040: Only, none of them are particularly great...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333003010: Wonderful. You're most welcome, to any of my anaemic little spells.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333005000: Well, I can't blame you, I suppose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333005010: But, in the case that you do change your mind,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333005020: just speak up, loud and clear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333006010: Care to donate a few runes?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333006020: Believe it or not, I studied glintstone sorceries at the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333006030: For a small donation, I'd be happy to share my knowledge.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020010: I'm afraid my meagre sorceries are no match for your generosity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020030: I can tell you what I know about this place. That should help a bit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020040: You've seen that structure to the north, towering over the water?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020050: That's the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Where we study glintstone sorceries.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020060: Only, its doors have been closed for quite some time now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020070: After they declared they wouldn't interfere with the Shattering,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020080: the academy cast repelling seals on the east gate leading to the Capital and the south gate leading here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020100: As you might have guessed, the seals are still active,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020110: making entry to the academy impossible without a glintstone key.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020120: And so I'm stuck here. A fledgling sorcerer, with little chance of acquiring a key.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333020130: When they cast the seals, I'd just popped out, and now I'm uprooted from my place of learning.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333021000: Why not find yourself a glintstone key?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333021010: Without one, you can't pass through the academy,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333021020: and you'll never reach the Erdtree Capital.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333021030: And if you find an extra glintstone key, perhaps...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333021040: Once you've tied up all your loose ends - and I can be very patient -
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333021050: would you consider donating it to me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333021060: I know it. I'm a bluntstone. Nary a hint of talent for sorcery.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333021070: But still, my place is at the academy...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333022000: Oh, one more thing... Beware the Albinaurics...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333022010: ...accursed souls born of a forbidden rite of the Eternal City.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333022020: The curse withered the legs of the old, and silenced the tongues of the Frogs.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333022030: And now they hold deep grudges for anyone left untouched.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333023020: I never imagined that a bluntstone like myself would have the chance to play teacher.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333024010: You're willing to give your glintstone key to me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333024040: Now I can go back to the academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333024050: To resume my study...of glintstone sorceries, and the very stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333025000: You've taken an apprenticeship with Sellen?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333025020: Sellen was well known. The most promising sorceress in the history of the academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333025030: I followed her at school, but there may as well have been an ocean between us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333025040: But Sellen was expelled from the academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333025050: Accused of unthinkable treatment of certain sorcerers, under the name of the Graven Witch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333025060: I still don't believe the accusations.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333025070: The illustrious Sellen would never do such things...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333026010: Without one, you can't pass through the academy,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333026020: and you'll never reach the Erdtree Capital.
