N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333030010: For me, is it? But surely, that's a passing fine brew?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333030020: My meagre sorceries hardly warrant such a reward.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333030040: I'll save it for a special occasion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333030050: I may never have another drink like it for as long as I live.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333040000: So, you've found yourself a glintstone key.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333040010: But I certainly can't take it from you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333040030: By rights, you should use it for yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333040040: It's true, I wish to return to my place of study.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333040050: But that's no excuse to impose upon others.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333040060: Ah...is this why bluntstones always finish last?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333041000: Head to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333041010: Carry on with your journey. Press forward with your fight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333041020: Don't bother holding yourself up for my sake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333051010: With your blessing, I will depart for the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333051020: Perhaps, one day, you'll pay me a visit?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333051030: Who knows, I may be a decorated sorcerer by then!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333100010: I'm a bluntstone. I don't even have a pebble's worth of power.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333100020: So I'm afraid I can't help you decipher the scroll.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333100030: I'm sorry I'm so useless. I truly am.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.333802000: There's no getting through to you, is there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334001000: Be proud. You were a fine warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334001010: Your only mistake was your choice of master.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334001020: Let the winds lift you, to a higher place.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334002000: Well, who do we have here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334002020: Tarnished, are you? Clearly not one of Godrick's lot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334002030: I am Nepheli Loux. Tarnished and warrior, like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334002040: I'm here by decree of my father.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334002060: This "grafting" of Godrick's ill befits a Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334003000: If you intend to challenge Godrick,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334003010: I ask you call upon me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334003020: The winds run foul with his deeds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334003030: I'm certain father would permit me aid the fight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334004000: Apologies, but I've idled long enough.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334004010: As fellow Tarnished we must each follow our own guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334004020: Down whatever road takes us to the throne of Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010010: I thought you'd receive a summons to the Roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010020: Nepheli Loux. We met at Stormveil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010030: I'm glad to see you here. I have something for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010040: I found it in Godrick's grafting grounds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010050: You defeated him. You should have it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010070: I don't intend to make a habit of scavenging corpses.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010090: I thought you'd receive a summons to the Roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010100: Nepheli Loux. We met at Stormveil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010110: I'm glad to see you here. I have something for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010120: I found it in Godrick's grafting grounds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010130: You were the one to defeat him, I would hazard?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334010150: I don't intend to make a habit of scavenging corpses.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334011010: I wonder if you've met my foster father?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334011020: He's in his study. The room Ensha's guarding just over there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334011030: If you haven't already, I advise you introduce yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334011040: Father is leader of the Roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334011050: I'm sure talking to him will be worth your while.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334012000: It's about time I headed off.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334012010: I'll see you again, warrior, should the fates deign it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334018010: You received a summons to the Roundtable?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334018020: Nepheli Loux. We met at Stormveil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334018030: The pleasure's mine, as a fellow Tarnished, guided by grace to the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334019010: I've not seen you here before.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334019030: Here by decree of my father.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334019040: The pleasure's mine, as a fellow Tarnished, guided by grace to the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334020000: Is that some kind of medicine?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334020010: One that affects the heart, I'd wager.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334020020: If it's what I think, I have no need of it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334020050: Not to brave the horrors of battle. Nor to bolster my resolve.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334030020: Well, what do you make of it? What's happened to this village?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334030030: I witnessed a sight much the same, in my infancy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334030040: The oppression of the weak. Murder and pillage unchecked.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334030050: A waking nightmare, made by men.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334031000: But this time, I'm a woman grown.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334031010: And though the suffering cannot be undone, I can still mete out justice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334031030: Let the scars I carve remind them. I am Nepheli Loux. Warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334040020: It's pathetic, I know, but I...need to think.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334041010: Right. It's true. My father cast me out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334041020: For indulging my emotions. Forgetting the mission. Punishment for offing his pawns.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334041030: Father...rather, Lord Gideon has offered me guidance all my life.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334041040: I would have done anything for him, to place him on the throne of Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334041050: And yet I... Though it was not my intent...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334042000: I...can no longer trust in father...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334042010: To think he'd order his men to enact such tragedy...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334042020: Where is the justice he purports, in that?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334042030: He once told me that if he became Elden Lord,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334042040: he would never allow the downtrodden to be cheated ever again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334042050: Was he simply lying to me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334043020: Father has always given me his guidance...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334050010: Fine. I'll take a dose. Perhaps it'll do me some good.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334060010: I can smell the ancient storm in it...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334060030: My thanks. I'll gladly take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334061010: I don't feel the presence of spirits, let alone see them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334061030: It reminds me of my first hawk.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334062000: In this ash, I can smell the ancient storm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334062010: It reminds me of my first hawk.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334070010: I must thank you, for your aid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334070020: I told father I would be with him no longer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334070030: I remembered the vow I took when I first became a warrior, so many moons ago.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334070040: This land is much like the one from which I hail.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334070050: I will call upon the storm, to drive away the foulness that has settled on the winds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334071000: Again, I am Nepheli Loux. Warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334071010: Some call me by the title of Lady, but I remain the same woman underneath.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334071020: Though I have now abandoned my former guidance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334071030: I cannot express how much you've helped me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334071050: I would gladly lighten your burden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334072010: I will remain, to summon the storm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334072020: But your guidance, and your fight...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334073000: I will remain, to summon the storm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334073010: But your guidance, and your fight...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334801010: Such conduct ill befits a warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334802000: I see. You are but a simple villain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334802010: Let the scars remind you; this lesson comes from Nepheli Loux!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.334803000: You wouldn't even register as a threat to father.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335001020: Well, while you're here. Have you, too, been seduced by the good lady alcohol?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335001030: Perhaps you've heard of dreambrew, the nectar of the demigods, once forbidden to we mortals?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335001040: Well, believe it or not, I know just how to make it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335001050: And if you were to help me gather its ingredients,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335001060: I'd gladly share some with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335001070: The Lands Between are no kind place for we Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335001080: And I'm getting too old to keep scavenging corpses on the battlefield...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335002030: That, is St. Trina's Crystal Ball.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335002040: It can be used to take slumber fog from those submerged in deepest sleep,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335002050: those merry fools sunk so low they will not awaken.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335002060: Dreambrew, I should say, is a special filtration of slumber fog.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335003000: Go ahead and bring me some slumber fog, my compeer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335003010: About two should do it, by my reckoning...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335003020: About three should do it, by my reckoning...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335003030: About four should do it, by my reckoning...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335003040: About five should do it, by my reckoning...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335003050: About six should do it, by my reckoning...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335003060: And then I'll have enough dreambrew to share.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335003070: Drink is a wonderful teacher. Imbibe and you will understand; this world's delights, and its futility.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335004000: You what? You hardly know what you're missing out on.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335004010: Well, suit yourself. But I'm sure you'll be after a drink before long.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335004020: Perhaps you'll tire of this crumbling world...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335004030: Or maybe you'll wish to uncover someone's deepest, darkest secrets...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335005000: What? Taken an interest in the finer things, after all?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335005010: Like dreambrew, the nectar of the demigods, once forbidden to we mortals?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335005020: Well, believe it or not, I know just how to make it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335005030: And if you were to help me gather its ingredients,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335005040: I'd gladly share some with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335010000: Ah, I've been eagerly awaiting your return.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335010010: How did you fare? Find any slumber fog?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335011010: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need two doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335011020: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need three doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335011030: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need four doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335011040: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need five doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335011050: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need six doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335012000: I see, I see. You have what I asked.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335012010: All splendid fogs of superior quality. Sediment firmly settled, mm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335012030: Here's the dreambrew I promised. All yours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335013000: Bring me more slumber fog, my compeer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335013010: Do so, and I'll have a bottle of dreambrew with your name on it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335014000: Allow me a little advice, my compeer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335014010: Dreambrew is known to drag people's secrets into the daylight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335014020: If that's what you seek, rather than the usual fleeting pleasures,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335014030: Then treat them to some dreambrew.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335014040: Secrets are like fine wine. The longer they mature in the dark, the richer the flavour...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335014050: Know that, and all will be as you desire. Friendship, rule, intrigue...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335016010: Have you brought me some more slumber fog?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335017000: You certainly have a taste for spirits.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335017010: I'm sure I'll be seeing a lot more of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335020000: As you surely know, my compeer, I am but a humble man of the cloth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335020010: And I must profess, the study of alcohol is but another form of worship.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335020020: Oh, St. Trina. My faith is in alcohol, and the hearts of men.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335030010: I heard the path to the Haligtree had been reopened.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335030020: So I forced these old bones to weather the journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335030030: Don't tell me it was you who opened the passage?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335030040: Nevertheless, it's rather nippy in these lands, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335030050: But there's nothing like a good drink to warm the cockles...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335032000: Oh it's, good, good to see you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335032010: I think I was about to freeze solid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335040000: You know, a holy personage was once abducted from these lands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335040010: Thus I am here in search of clues that might unravel the mystery.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335040020: The abductor's bloody footprints are said to have disappeared in the Forest of Ancient Bowers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335040030: Hm? That's quite a face you're pulling...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335040040: Need I remind you? Though I am but a humble man of the cloth,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335040050: each of us has our secrets, my compeer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335041000: You know, a holy personage was once abducted from these lands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335041010: Thus I am here in search of clues that might unravel the mystery.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335041020: The abductor's bloody footprints are said to have disappeared in the Forest of Ancient Bowers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335050010: St. Trina's, no, Lord Miquella's cadaver.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335050020: I have partaken of untold secrets.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335050030: Such that I might aid you, O Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335050040: So please, I hope you can welcome your humble servant Rhico,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335050050: Into your dream, the world of your heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335050060: Indeed, I beg you grant my wish,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335050070: That when you transcend from empyrean to god, allow me a place by your side.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335051000: I have partaken of untold secrets.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335051010: Such that I might aid you, O Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335051020: So please, I hope you can welcome your humble servant Rhico,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335051030: Into your dream, the world of your heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335100000: Oh ho, are you asking me to partake?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335100010: Well, I haven't got a clue what to think.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335100020: Is this outright impudence? Simple callousness? Or genuine kindness, I wonder?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335100040: Well, what matters it? I'll take some, regardless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335100050: You couldn't possibly fathom the secrets I possess, my compeer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335800020: You do know I'm merely a beggar.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335801010: For those who came before you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335802000: Well, that knocked the wind out of me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.335802010: The perfect time to try that special reserve…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337001010: After being out there, it must be quite surprising,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337001020: to see our capital, cradled by the Erdtree, showered by an eternal wellspring of grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337001030: The sights, the sounds, the luscious scents. Each precisely as they should be. Each eternal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337002010: I didn't notice that you were Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337002030: Now, you mustn't take this the wrong way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337002040: But you must leave the capital at once.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003000: It is for your own good, I assure you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003010: All things have their proper place.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003020: We, having been chosen by grace, were given this Golden Capital.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003030: You, on the other hand, have your own home, which is a far cry from here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003040: So far, in fact, that it cannot be further marred by your touch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003050: The Shattering caused a great many fools to overstep their bounds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003060: Their impudence led to insurgency against Morgott, Lord of Grace. They raised an army, and sought to lay siege to this sacred ground.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003070: But do you see where it got them? King Morgott's rule would not be shaken!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003080: Their attempt to defile the capital failed, and while we revelled in eternal grace,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003090: the traitors were eyed by the grotesque Fell Omen, and their corpses piled high outside the wall!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337003110: The capital is simply not where you belong.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337004000: You mustn't take it the wrong way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337004010: But you must leave the capital at once.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337010030: Well, then perhaps we can talk.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337010040: For a barbarous Tarnished, you see the difference between right and wrong rather clearly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337010050: Very well. I permit your stay in the capital for the time being.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337010060: And in the name of the house of Shanehaight, I beseech you hunt down the foul Omen.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337010070: The Undercapital is a repository of waste.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337010080: For ages it's teemed with repulsive Omen. Fiendlings, even, who've never lost a horn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337010090: And what's worse, they've taken to bellowing in a most blood-curdling manner. You can hear it all the way up here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337010100: A vile, ceaseless affront to the Erdtree's sanctity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337011010: Hunt down the vile Omen scurrying about in the Undercapital, and give us peace from those wretched howls.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337011020: I know you can do it. Do not dishonour House Shanehaight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337020000: Haven't set off to hunt the Omen yet?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337020010: Well, you're certainly dragging your heels more than I foresaw.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337020030: We Shanehaights are known for patience, a virtue amongst the noble.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337021000: Haven't set off to hunt the Omen yet?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337021010: That wretched screeching... I feel as if I could go mad.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030000: Ohh, there you are, pleased to see you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030010: You must've expunged the Omen from the repository.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030020: Otherwise their revolting screeches would still be affronting my ears.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030030: Well, you've done us a fine service, I must say.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030040: The Erdbishops will be very pleased to hear it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030050: No, this is above their station...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030060: If I explained that this was all my idea,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030070: I could be granted audience with Morgott, Lord of Grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030090: That a viscount as myself might be seen by the Lord of Grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337030100: Such an honour will place me amongst the most venerated Shanehaights.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337031000: Oh, very sorry, I almost forgot about you completely.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337031010: This Shanehaight heirloom has been held for generations.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337031020: It is yours now, a reward for your fearless execution of my request.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337032000: I'm afraid its worth might be lost on a Tarnished, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337032010: For everything, there is a first. For you, and for House Shanehaight, and its newfound glory.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337033000: Now, I need to get myself ready.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337033010: If fortune favours me, and I am seen by the Lord of Grace,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337033020: I'd be put to shame if I didn't look my very best.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.337040010: He is a stain upon all things golden...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348002010: Well, it matters not. If you are wise, you will leave, immediately.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348002020: My flesh writhes with scarlet rot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348002030: It is a curse. Not to be meddled with by man.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348003000: If you are wise, you will leave, immediately.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348003010: My flesh writhes with scarlet rot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348010000: You ask that I stab myself with the needle...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348010060: than simply continue to spoil from within.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348011000: Would you mind...averting your eyes for a moment?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348011050: Well. That was easier than expected.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348020010: My apologies, for when last we met. I fainted before I could even thank you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348020020: Everything is as you said. Since inserting the needle, the scarlet rot has ceased to writhe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348020030: Even the nightmares have abated... And now, though I can scarcely believe it myself, I can move as I please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348020040: Not that I could ever truly repay you,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348020050: but I would like you to have this, by way of thanks. A token, though it is.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348021000: I'm considering leaving. On a journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348021010: With the needle buried in my flesh, I've started to recall, but dimly...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348021040: My name is Millicent. I pray fate permits us meet again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348022000: I'm considering leaving. On a journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348022010: With the needle buried in my flesh, I've started to recall, but dimly...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348025010: Something about this place felt familiar to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348025020: So I decided to pay a visit, hoping to find someone here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348025040: Perhaps before my departure, I needed someone to say farewell to.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348026010: I must focus on my journey, for which I have you to thank.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348030010: In truth, it's been smooth sailing, for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348030020: The scarlet rot has stilled, since last we met.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348030030: As such, I've been able to continue my journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348030050: I realise that if I still had my sword arm,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348030060: I could have aided you in battle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348031000: Now, I'm tracing the path Malenia took,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348031010: after unleashing the power of the scarlet rot, during her battle with General Radahn, in the Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348031020: I should like to meet her, this vanished woman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348031030: I think she's in the north.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348031040: In the lands that lie beyond the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348032030: I am in your debt, yet again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348032040: I think, If the arm serves well enough,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348032050: It might be possible for me to wield a sword again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348033000: If the arm serves well enough,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348033010: It might be possible for me to wield a sword again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348033020: Perhaps, then, I can aid you in battle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348035000: Now, I'm tracing the path Malenia took.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348035010: She's passed into to the lands that lie beyond the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348040010: The arm you gave me truly is a thing of wonder.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348040020: It feels just like my own, even handling a sword.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348040030: Perhaps it is foolish to say this to you of all people, but I am sure of my skill with the sword.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348040040: Thus, I would have you call upon me in battle again, should you ever have the need.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348041010: The arm you gave me truly is a thing of wonder.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348041020: It feels just like my own, even handling a sword.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348041030: Perhaps it is foolish to say this to you of all people, but I am sure of my skill with the sword.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348041040: Thus, I would have you call upon me in battle, should you ever have the need.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348042000: I would have you call upon me in battle, should you ever have the need.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348042010: It is the only way that I can express my thanks.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348050000: To think we'd meet in such a place...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348050020: No, I know well enough who you are, and what I know is good enough for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348050030: Call upon me again in battle, should you have the need.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348051000: I'm searching for a fort to the west of the ruins.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348051010: I'm searching for a fort to the north of the ruins.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348051020: I heard the master of the fort was given a medallion that allowed him to visit the Haligtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348051030: Indeed, I believe that is where Malenia will be found.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348051040: The Haligtree is hidden somewhere in these Northern lands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348052000: I'm searching for a fort to the west of the ruins.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348052010: I'm searching for a fort to the north of the ruins.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348052020: I heard the master of the fort was given a medallion that allowed him to visit the Haligtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348060010: I can only surmise our purposes are aligned.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348060020: In which case, allow me to explain myself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348060040: But in what capacity I know not. I could be sister, daughter, or an offshoot…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348060050: Whatever the case though, I am certain of a kinship between us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348061000: There is something I must return to Malenia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348061010: The will that was once her own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348061020: The dignity, the sense of self, that allowed her to resist the call of the scarlet rot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348061030: The pride she abandoned, to meet Radahn's measure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348062000: There is something I must return to Malenia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348062010: The will that was once her own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348062020: The dignity, the sense of self, that allowed her to resist the call of the scarlet rot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348070010: Thank you for lending your hand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348070020: Without your help, I could not have defeated that quartet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348070030: I feel as if I've been in your debt from beginning to end.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348070040: Thank you. With your help, I was able to live as my own person, if only in passing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348071000: But this is where things end.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348071010: I pause to even tell you, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348071020: I took out the needle myself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348071030: Tell whoever put you up to this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348071040: That if I am to flower into something other than myself,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348071050: I would rather rot into nothingness as I am.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348072010: The scarlet rot writhes now, worse than ever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348072020: Soon, I won't be more than a mound of flesh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348072040: I wouldn't want such a thing to bring you harm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348803000: I will not forget what you did for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348803010: But this day marks our farewell.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348804000: I did not imagine it ending like this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348804010: But I will not forget what you have done.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.348805020: Was I... was it all...for this?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349001000: Oh, a pleasure to see you, a pleasure indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349001010: I am Gowry. A great sage, in my day, anyway.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349001020: I'd hoped to ask a favour, when one of your ilk came along.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349001030: A strapping young Tarnished, able to cross the scarlet swamp of Aeonia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349001040: Don't fret, I'll provide fine recompense.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349001060: I will teach you the secret of Sellia, the town you see there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349010000: Ah, then you're willing to lend a hand, are you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349010010: I need your help to heal a certain young girl.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349010020: Her name is Millicent. You will find her beyond Sellia,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349010030: resting at the church atop the cliff, stricken by the rotting sickness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349011000: The rotting sickness that afflicts Millicent has no cure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349011010: When the Erdtree flourished, even the demigods could not stave off its effects, despite their nigh godhood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349011020: But Millicent's suffering can be ameliorated.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349011030: For this, you are to find a certain needle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349011040: Seek the deep scarlet swamp of Aeonia, outside Sellia's bounds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349011050: The needle, made from unalloyed gold, is lost somewhere there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349012000: First, you must find the unalloyed gold needle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349012010: It's hidden somewhere in the deep scarlet swamp of Aeonia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349012020: Then I will tell you, as promised.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349012030: The secret of the town of Sellia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349013000: Ah, my apologies. I rather got ahead of myself, didn't I.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349013010: Well, no matter. I'm accustomed to waiting.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349013020: But if you should decide to hear my offer, whenever that may be,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349013030: do come and speak with me again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349013040: I'll wait as long as it takes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349014000: Ah, changed your mind, have you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349014010: If you are willing to undertake my request,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349014020: I'll gladly share with you the secret of Sellia, the town yonder.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349020000: Ohh, you've found the unalloyed gold needle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349020010: As promised, I've detailed the secret of Sellia right here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349020030: Now, let me have a look at the needle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349020060: Well, well, this is a marvel indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349020070: The work of a true artisan…a meticulous, bold craftsman who grasps the essence of life.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349020080: Can you give me some time with this?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349020090: As well made as it is, it won't be much use snapped in half, will it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349021010: The needle is repaired. Now it will forestall the rotting sickness, I'm sure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349021020: Will you give it to the girl, Millicent?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349021030: I will reward you in kind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349021040: Millicent rests at the church atop the cliff, beyond Sellia, the town yonder.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349021050: Tended to by the witless pests who worship her, or rather, her rotting sickness, as a god.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349021060: A wretched fate, indeed. The poor girl, she never wished for any of this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349022010: That I would show such concern for the girl.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349022020: Well, I'm the one that found her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349022030: A mere babe, in the swamp of Aeonia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349022040: She is one of my dear daughters.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349022050: But the rotting sickness erodes one's memory.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349022060: I doubt that she remembers the first thing about me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349022070: Oh, I must be getting old. I didn't always worry so much.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349023000: Can you give me some time with this?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349023010: As well made as it is, it won't be much use snapped in half, will it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349027000: Now, all you need do is deliver the needle to Millicent.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349027010: She's convalescing in the church atop the cliff just beyond Sellia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349027020: Do so, and you shall receive handsome recompense, of course.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349030010: For giving the needle to Millicent.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349030020: Now she, too, can begin her journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349030030: And stare her fate straight in the eye.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349030040: You've been a saint, through and through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349030050: As thanks, I vow to impart to you my knowledge
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349030060: of the lost sorceries of the Sellians, descendants of the Eternal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349031000: Please make certain that little Millicent goes unharmed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349031010: Like her mother, she has the stuff to be a great warrior,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349031020: but commands only one arm, and is yet preciously young.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349032010: Indeed, Millicent did visit this hovel of a home.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349032020: It seems the memories eaten away by the rotting sickness yet remain, but faintly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349032030: However, she has no need of me, any more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349032040: No, she must embark on her journey, and stare her fate in the eye. I mustn't impede.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349032050: As I've aged, I've found the best way to aid the young...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349035000: Ah, welcome, welcome. How may I help?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349036000: Do you...need me for something else?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349040000: So, you gave Millicent a golden arm replacement…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349040030: Now Millicent may fully realise her true warrior's potential.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349041000: The girl, Millicent. She is a bud.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349041010: Green and undeveloped, waiting to flower into magnificence.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349041020: What a wondrous day that will be.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349041030: In truth, before her, I'd never seen a bud of such superior quality.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349041040: She might very well outshine her sisters.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349050000: Do you have an interest in rot incantations?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349050010: Then you might like to learn something of the history...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349050020: of Malenia, goddess of scarlet rot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349051000: Queen Marika and her King Consort Radagon were blessed with twin demigods, and Malenia was one of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349051010: She was born an Empyrean, carrying the scarlet rot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349051030: In the age of the Elden Ring, and Queen Marika,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349051040: the precious Empyrean was born. A new god to forge a new Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349051050: Since Malenia fought Radahn, and the great scarlet flower blossomed in Aeonia, I have dedicated myself to her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349051060: And to the resplendence of the Order of Rot. The cycle of decay and rebirth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349060000: Oh, Millicent. Finding herself, is she?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349060010: The words of a true innocent, the dear girl.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349060020: Well, perhaps this is just as it should be.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349060030: Little Millicent, following in the steps of her mother, no matter what.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349060040: This is their fate, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349071000: Oh, mm, I didn't notice you there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349071010: Welcome. How may I help you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349071020: My apologies though, you hardly needed to see me like that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349072010: I realised that I'd soon be saying my goodbyes to Millicent, and…
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349072030: She is to meet them very soon. Her sisters.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349072040: And when she does, she'll be defeated, surely, and begin to flower.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349072060: If you happen to be present for the girl's fight with her sisters,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349072070: I ask that you side with the sisters and kill Millicent.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349072080: It must be done by your hand; no other.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349072090: Millicent trusts you, rather deeply in fact.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349072100: Sever that trust. Nurtured by betrayal, her bud will flower most vividly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349072110: When Malenia ascends to godhood, Millicent too shall be reborn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349073000: Thus, I have a request of the utmost import.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349073020: Before the girl can meet her sisters.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349073030: There is no other way. It must be done by your hand alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349073040: You seem to have sown a seed in Millicent's heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349073050: Which will flower most vividly, should she be plucked by you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349073060: Malenia will be a goddess. And once she is, Millicent will flower anew, as a scarlet valkyrie.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349074000: You can't tell me you don't wish to see it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349074010: The superior bud that is Millicent, becoming the finest of flowers?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349074020: I beg of you, kill her. With your own two hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349075000: Welcome, welcome. How may I help you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349075010: Oh how I have counted the days. Millicent shall soon meet her sisters.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349076010: Do what you must to ensure Millicent dies.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349076040: Why would you take out the needle?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349076050: You were so close. So very close. To becoming the fairest of all flowers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349076060: Would you disown us too? As your Mother did?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349076070: We children of the scarlet rot?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349078020: Do you detest us, so utterly?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349080000: Have you taken the lesson, now?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349080010: Killing me is but an exercise in futility.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349080020: All is well, provided you understand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349080030: Let's just pretend it never happened, shall we?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349080060: Who would prune your sapling flesh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349110000: Well, well. What have we here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349110010: I-is this to toast the girl's departure?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349111000: Well, well. What have we here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349111010: Is this to toast the girl's flowering?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349111020: You've got a good head on your shoulders.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349801010: There is nothing to be gained by persevering.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349802010: Perhaps you've taken one knock to the head too many.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349803000: We shall meet again, you and I.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349803010: There are countless pests to choose from.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.349804010: As many times as it takes. For you to understand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351001000: Oh, I see you've just arrived.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351001010: Welcome to the Roundtable Hold. I'm Corhyn, a man of the cloth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351001020: I teach incantations, the strength granted us by the Two Fingers,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351001030: and explore the secrets of the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351001040: So that one day, if a Tarnished of the Roundtable Hold should become Elden Lord, I might counsel them,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351001050: ensuring order regains its proper form, righting rule over men.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351001060: By the way, do you still see it? The guidance of grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351002010: Most Tarnished are blind to it these days.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351002020: You are something of a rare breed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351002030: Well, what do you say? Care to learn an incantation of the Two Fingers?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351003020: It's likely a temporary condition, I'm told. For whatever reason, it happens from time to time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351003030: Just keep your chin up, and stay the path.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351003040: I pray the great guidance of grace returns to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351004010: Has the guidance of grace returned to your vision?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351005010: Just keep your chin up, and stay the path.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351005020: I pray the great guidance of grace returns to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351010000: Further study of incantations, is it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351010010: I can happily spare the time, and applaud your enthusiasm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351011000: Ah, you appear to be doing well. Very good.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351011010: Well then. Would you like to learn an incantation?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351012000: May the Golden Order shine through you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351015000: There's something I should mention to you, as well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351015010: I'm thinking of leaving the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351015020: Do you know of the noble Goldmask?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351015030: Though he was but a Tarnished, living outside the Lands Between,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351015040: he was a great scholar, who foresaw the coming guidance of grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351015050: And now, I hear he has come to the Lands Between alone, to contemplate the Golden Order...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351015060: I wish nothing more than to seek his instruction, and perhaps even help him in his research.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351020000: Ah, I had been waiting for your return.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351020010: I've decided to leave the Roundtable Hold after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351020020: As I mentioned, I'm off in search of the noble Goldmask.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351020030: We may not meet again for some time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351020040: If there's any incantations you wish to learn, now's the moment.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351021000: Ah, I had been waiting for your return.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351021010: I've decided to leave the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351021020: I'm off in search of a noble scholar known as the Goldmask, to beg his instruction.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351021030: We may not meet again for some time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351021040: If there's any incantations you wish to learn, now's the moment.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351030000: Ah, look who we have here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351030010: How delightful, to meet a familiar face, even after departing the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351030020: I've been doing some learning of my own since then, actually.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351030030: And will happily pass it along to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351035000: I'm yet to find the noble Goldmask.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351035010: I suppose he'll be closer to the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351035020: The path ahead might be perilous, but tread it I shall.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351035030: Since departing the Roundtable Hold, I've come to understand, in my solitude,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351035040: How little it is I truly know...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351036010: From your description, it can be no other than the Goldmask himself!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351036020: Of course, of course, I knew he would be close by.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351036030: Bless the Golden Order, and its benevolent rays.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351036040: And to you too. My sincerest thanks.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351037000: I will soon leave to join the noble Goldmask.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351037010: It is entirely thanks to you. You have my sincerest gratitude.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351040010: Thanks to you, I have become acquainted with the noble Goldmask himself,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351040020: and taken my place by his side, as you can see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351040030: Have no fear, I will still teach you incantations, as before.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351040040: Though we must do so quietly, such that we not disturb the great master's cogitation.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351041000: Further study of incantations, is it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351042000: Ah, you appear to be doing well. Very good.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351042010: Well then. Would you like to learn an incantation?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351043000: May the Golden Order shine through you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351045000: The master is always deep in contemplation.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351045010: While I frantically attempt to record his wisdom; the movement of his finger.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351045020: And though I am yet to comprehend even the daintiest morsel of his wisdom...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351045030: I know that this, this is my life's calling.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351045040: The Golden Order has bestowed me, talentless as I am, the great duty of documentarian.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351046000: Master! What ever is the matter?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351046010: Please, I implore you continue! Continue your reflections, your rhythms!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351046020: I must be the one to record them!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351046030: What matters this issue of Radagon, really?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351046040: The Erdtree, heart of the Golden Order, lies before our very eyes!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351046050: Why must these qualms come to you now?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351046060: We were on the very cusp!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351047000: Oh, was that you? Sorry, I hardly noticed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351047010: I'm a little shaken since the master ceased his movements.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351049010: Yes, the master is still ceased.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351049020: And after coming all this way... Why now, of all times?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351050000: The master's reflections had heightened as we neared the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351050010: While still a precise calculus, the rhythms grew increasingly wild.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351050030: Now the master is facing quite the puzzle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351050040: The Golden Order is founded on the principle that Marika is the one true god. However...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351050050: The name of Marika's second husband, King Consort Radagon, also appeared...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351050080: His finger has remained still, ever since Radagon's name was discovered.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351050100: The master only has me, and here I fail him...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351051000: What on earth did you do to the master?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351051020: Master's finger moves again, resuming his cogitation; more than good enough for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351051030: I haven't the words to thank you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351051040: So I'd like to pass this on to you instead.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351051050: A glimpse into the heart of the Golden Order, documented by yours truly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351052000: To think, that Radagon was Marika herself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351052010: Or at least, such is all I can interpret from the rhythm and calculus of his finger.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351052020: How would such a thing even have been possible, I wonder.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351052030: Sadly, I cannot comprehend it, myself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351052040: Do you have a fuller understanding of the matter?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351052060: Well, either way, I can continue my documentation.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351052070: In truth it matters very little whether I understand the master's thoughts or not,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351052080: I am merely his scribe. It is my sole and unwavering purpose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351053020: His finger has remained still, ever since Radagon's name was discovered.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351053030: But oh, how important could it really be?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351053040: The Erdtree, heart of the Golden Order, lies before our very eyes!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351053050: Why must these qualms come to you now?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351053060: We were on the very cusp!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351060010: I can't believe you've come all this way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065000: I've…been gripped by a terrifying thought.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065010: The rhythms and calculus of the master's finger...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065020: betray a suspicion of the holism of the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065030: A conceit, I am afraid, that cannot be overlooked.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065040: Oh, but how could this be?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065050: I dread to even entertain the possibility...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065060: but somehow, I cannot cast aside my doubts about the master.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065070: Tell me, have I simply lost my head?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065080: Only, if the master were true to the Golden Order,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351065090: why would he think to breach this forbidden mount of fire?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351066000: Oh master, put my mind at ease.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351066020: I want to place my trust in you, to be your scribe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351067010: It will make me forget, you say?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351067020: So that I can push aside these frightful thoughts...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351067040: Would that I could... Would that I could...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351070020: The master was nothing more than a madman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351070030: Enchanted by a vain and ruinous delusion, he rejected the perfection of the Golden Order,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351070040: seeking to supplant our glorious faith with his own!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351070050: Could there be a more pitiable comedy?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351070060: Look at it. The culmination of perfection, burning, before our very eyes!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351080010: I'm right here. Please, show me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351080020: Your finger. Your rhythms, and calculus.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351090010: It's good to see your enthusiasm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351090020: Indeed, I will happily take it off your hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351091010: Its incantations bear no lineage from the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351091020: My interests lie solely in the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351092010: Its incantations bear no lineage from the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351092030: Very well...I'll take it off your hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351092040: I cannot afford to maintain my innocence any longer. I must dirty my hands to test my faith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351092050: Even if it offers only the most meagre of hints, I will do whatever I can to help my master.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351801000: What are you trying to achieve?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351802010: Faith grants me strength, that I might endure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351802020: O Golden Order, shine through me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.351803010: That the guidance of grace abandons you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700001000: A proper death means returning to the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700001010: Have patience. Until the time comes...and the roots call to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700010000: The mausoleum prowls. Cradling the soulless demigod.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700010010: O Marika, Queen Eternal. He is your unwanted child.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700020000: O Sapling! Sweet sapling of glorious gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700030000: Unthinkable. Our hallowed resting place is violated.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700030010: To refuse the Erdtree's call to return, to live within Death... Sickening.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700040000: The demi-humans wax wroth, now their mother's been taken...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700050000: Please, help me. I'm of noble blood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700050010: If those hideous mongrels eat me, I'll be forever marred...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700050020: Anything but that, please! Think of the disgrace!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700060000: All I wanted was to fight. To fight, as a warrior, to the last...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700060010: So, why? Why, O guidance of grace, will this door not open?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700070010: Maiden, dear maiden, where are you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700080010: Ohh, there it is, the tower!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.700080020: Finally, I can return. To our home, bathed in rays of gold!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701001010: Please, even if it's just you, old Albus, hide well and still your breath.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701010010: Ahh, Lord Vyke, it seems that you were no lord, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701010020: Then where is he? Our true Lord, our Lord of Frenzied Flame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701010030: We beg of you, incinerate all that divides and distinguishes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701010040: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701030010: Raya Lucaria, hallowed hall dedicated to the study of magic.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701030020: Why shut your doors to me? Am I barred from donning the crown of stone?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701040020: These royal grounds were placed in our trust,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701050010: O Celestial Globe, transmit to posterity. The wisdom of the moon and stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701050020: And obscure, forever, the transgressions of the princess.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701060010: Lady Ranni, we have long awaited you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701060020: I pray for your house's swift revival.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701060030: May the full moon shine upon Caria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701070000: Come out, one and all, from the darkness underground.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701070010: And let us offer unto the maiden our eyes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701080000: Ahh, the poor fellow...gone perfectly mad.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701080010: Love...revenge...the frenzied flame melts it all away...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.701090020: Another path, leading back to the foot of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702001010: Eek... I hear a festive melody...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702001030: My hide is filthy, I swear...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702010020: The Golden Order itself, unwavering, stretched to the sky.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702010030: Confer your guidance. To our Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702010040: To put this weary world to rights...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702020020: If this putrid field of death is what your blasphemy would bring,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702020030: then I can no longer abide.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702030020: Just deserts, for falling for that severed harpy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702030030: No surprise that guilty cretin took the castle and our storied sword...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702040020: Heh heh... I'll survive, I swear it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.702040030: I'll soon be back at the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703001020: The very first flower of Aeonia bloomed on this very spot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703001030: Malenia, may you blossom into a goddess.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703010020: Honor General Radahn, with a warrior's glory.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703010030: It's in your hands, Sir Jerren...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703020010: Let me see it, if only one last time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703020020: Your splendid blade, dancing amongst the scarlet rot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703030010: I'm dry, dry as a bone...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703030030: Let me feast on your heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703040030: The very earth that Caelid rests upon, and Sellia, town of sorcery.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.703040040: The end is nigh, for us all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.704001010: Ohh great sun! Frigid sun of Sol!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.704001030: Grant life to the soulless bones!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.704010020: The sun has not been swallowed. Our prayers were lacking.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.704010040: I will never set my eyes upon it now...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.704020010: Show me the path, O gentle lights.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.704020020: The promised path to the Haligtree!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.704030020: Show me the path, O gentle lights...the path to Elphael.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.704040010: Mohg, you rotten Omen. Your blood is cursed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.704040040: How dare you lay hands on such precious flesh!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.705001020: I beg you, grant me a seat at the table of the dynasty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.706001020: Tall and unwavering, mindless of the scorch of the flame of ruin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.706001040: Then, we are yet Golden Ones.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.706010000: He is returned! The Lord has returned at long last.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.706010010: Our very first lord, to brandish the Elden Ring once more...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.706020030: Recall the arts of war. And your warrior's blood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.730000105: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.730000110: There is only one tree, and only its branches.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.730000115: That bathe in true rays of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.730000130: O, we are the Golden Ones. The true and rightful heirs.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.730000135: Our land's grown old, now ashen, and cold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.730000140: But look up, the Erdtree glows!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.730000145: Is there still a place for us?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.730000150: In our home, bathed in rays of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.730000160: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.736000110: Grant us the droplets of life,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.736000140: We swat at flies, snuff out flame,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.736000150: Repel the Omen, and undo Tarnish.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.736000160: Blessed we, at your side, eternal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.736000170: Blessed we, at your side, on this journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.736000180: Serve you we shall, in life, eternal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.740500100: <battlefield warcry - rallying his own spirit by shouting the name of his home: "For Kaiden!" etc.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000110: Feral flame of Agheel, burn true...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000210: We journey on a road so far,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000230: Coffin in tow, we'll find a hero
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000240: And scraps of his great deeds!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000260: Who rode along this road before?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000310: <Pathetic nonverbal wail that seems to suggest "Stop! Just go away!">
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000320: <Pathetic nonverbal wail when he suddenly notices a stranger nearby>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000410: Grant us the droplets of life,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000440: We swat at flies, snuff out flame,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000450: Repel the Omen, and undo Tarnish.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000460: Blessed we, at your side, eternal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000470: Blessed we, at your side, on this journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743000480: Serve you we shall, in life, eternal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743400100: <Incoherent rambling. Very quiet, but sounds acutely irritated and on the verge of breaking out in madness.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743400110: <The wings of a fly reverberate inside his headpiece, and it becomes too much to tolerate - he makes this sound as his psyche snaps.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743820100: <Sound of swinging a giant pickaxe. A slow swing with much weight. Several versions.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.743820110: <A shout as he holds his pickaxe high, mustering strength. Several versions.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.746000100: <A roar as he releases the all the strength that he was holding inside. A growly warcry.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.746000110: <He screams to intimidate his foe as he draws his sword.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.746000120: <A shout as he holds his sword high, mustering strength: whoaahhh! Etc.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.746000130: <Feeling bored and exhausted, his jaw drops open and this sound emanates from deep down his throat. It is a low bellowing that can be heard echoing around the vicinity.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.746900200: <Invigorating shouts for repeated rapier thrusts. Sharply enunciated, suggesting proper training.>
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800001000: You're a Tarnished, I can see it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800001020: That you're not after my throat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800001030: Then why not purchase a little something?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800001040: I am Kalé. Purveyor of fine goods.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800002000: What is it? Still going to purchase something?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800003010: Well, you're back. Care to buy something?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800004010: Always a pleasure. Care to purchase anything?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800007000: I am of a nomadic people.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800007020: The land has been tainted by madness since the shattering of the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800007030: It's only Tarnished like yourself who keep things from drying up entirely.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800007040: Let's say you're a very welcome customer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800008000: You know, if you can spare the runes,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800008010: you should buy yourself a crafting kit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800008020: A crafting kit allows you to make basic items on your own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800008030: Essential really, if you intend to survive out here for any duration.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800008040: The kit costs a bundle, and I admit, I do take my cut.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800008050: But the important thing is that you survive. Every customer counts, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800009000: I'm glad you took my warning to heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800010000: There are others of my people who yet survive in these lands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800010010: If the mood takes you when you meet one, then offer them some trade, won't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800010020: My people, wanderers all, have long been spurned by the grace of gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800010030: Which is why we cannot settle, but instead are forced into this pitiful, unceasing journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800010040: But thanks to that, things are not so different for us now, though the Elden Ring is shattered.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800010050: I think this makes us kindred spirits of sorts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800010060: Your people, the Tarnished, and mine.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800011000: I suppose I shouldn't keep this from you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800011010: I'm thinking of moving elsewhere for a time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800011020: My people are wanderers all, which I won't deny is one reason...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800011030: But I've done all I can here, in search of the Great Caravan.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800012000: Perhaps you don't need to hear this, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800012010: See that no harm comes to my kin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800012020: We have a saying, we wanderers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800012030: Lament not your solitude. Expect no sympathy. No regard. Nothing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800012040: But if anyone dares harm us, show them no mercy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800012050: That is our code, so to speak.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800012060: Just the way we are. Deeply... unforgiving.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800013010: Have you heard of the Great Caravan?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800014010: Well, even we had a place to call home, once.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800014020: The Great Caravan, they called it… but it's been lost to us for ages.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800014030: I've been searching for it as long as I can remember.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800014040: And with a name like that,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.800014050: You'd hope they kept some fine goods there, eh.
